text.1000: [03]482^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0113"^ea^tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m  hoti? yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa  iriyanaa vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1001: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, tii.nindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti,  eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1002: [03]483^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro piiti cittassekaggataa jiivitindriya.m;  ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa ^a^"V0.0122"^ea^aruupino  dhammaa .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa  vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1005: [03]484^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0140"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  kaamaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa ^a^"P0.0095"^ea^upacitattaa  vipaakaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu uppannaa hoti upekkhaasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa  vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.naa vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti,  manindriya.m hoti, upekkhindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa  pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa --  ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1006: [03]485^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0114"^ea^tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti.
text.1007: [03]486^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m  cetosamphassaja.m adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa  vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti.
text.1008: [03]487^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa  sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti.
text.1009: [03]488^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0123"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa  cetayitatta.m -- aya.m ^a^"T0.0141"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti.
text.1010: [03]489^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m  vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m hoti.
text.1011: [03]490^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti.
text.1012: [03]491^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye caaro vicaaro anuvicaaro upavicaaro cittassa  anusandhaanataa anupekkhanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti.
text.1013: [03]492^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa hoti.
text.1014: [03]493^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0115"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  cittassekaggataa hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.1015: [03]494^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  ^a^"P0.0096"^ea^tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano  manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.1016: [03]495^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0142"^ea^tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti.
text.1017: [03]496^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0124"^ea^tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti?  yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa iriyanaa  vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1018: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, tii.nindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti,  eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1019: [03]497^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro cittassekaggataa jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa  pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa  .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime ^a^"T0.0143"^ea^dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1022: [03]498^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0116"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m  samaye kaamaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaakaa  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu uppannaa hoti somanassasahagataa  ~naa.nasampayuttaa...pe0... somanassasahagataa ~naa.nasampayuttaa  sasa"nkhaarena...pe0... somanassasahagataa ~naa.navippayuttaa...pe0...  somanassasahagataa ~naa.navippayuttaa sasa"nkhaarena...pe0...  upekkhaasahagataa ~naa.nasampayuttaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagataa ~naa.nasampayuttaa  sasa"nkhaarena...pe0... upekkhaasahagataa ~naa.navippayuttaa...pe0...  upekkhaasahagataa ~naa.navippayuttaa sasa"nkhaarena ^a^"P0.0097"^ea^ruupaaramma.naa  vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.naa vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti ^a^"V0.0125"^ea^...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0... alobho abyaakatamuula.m...pe0... adoso  abyaakatamuula.m...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1025: [03]499^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  ruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati pathaviikasi.na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ^a^"T0.0144"^ea^ime dhammaa kusalaa.  tasseva ruupaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaaka.m  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  pathaviikasi.na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1026: [03]500^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  ruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m  jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m...pe0... pa.thama.m  jhaana.m...pe0... pa~ncama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati pathaviikasi.na.m, tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  kusalaa. tasseva ruupaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa  vipaaka.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... pa~ncama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  pathaviikasi.na.m, tasmi.m ^a^"M0.0117"^ea^samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1029: [03]501^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0126"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa  pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa  aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime ^a^"T0.0145"^ea^dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva  aruupaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaaka.m sabbaso  ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m  amanasikaaraa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ^a^"P0.0098"^ea^ca  pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1030: [03]502^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva  aruupaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaaka.m sabbaso  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m  sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1031: [03]503^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma  aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva  aruupaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa ^a^"T0.0146"^ea^katattaa upacitattaa vipaaka.m  ^a^"M0.0118"^ea^sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma  aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1032: [03]504^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso ^a^"V0.0127"^ea^aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0...  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.  tasseva aruupaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaaka.m  sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0...  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^"P0.0099"^ea^viharati, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1036: [03]505^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya  pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo ^a^"T0.0147"^ea^hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.  tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... a~n~nindriya.m hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0...  ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1037: [03]506^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya  pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa ^a^"M0.0119"^ea^ kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa  vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^"V0.0128"^ea^viharati  dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m animitta.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... a~n~nindriya.m hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0...  ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1038: [03]507^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya  pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa ^a^"P0.0100"^ea^pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa  vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m ^a^"T0.0148"^ea^jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... a~n~nindriya.m hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0...  ime dhammaa abyaakataa.

text.1097: [03]551^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya  pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m  chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m  chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m  chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0...  catuttha.m jhaana.m...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m...pe0... pa~ncama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m chandaadhipateyyanti  kusala.m...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m  chandaadhipateyyanti vipaako...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m ^a^"M0.0134"^ea^ khippaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m chandaadhipateyyanti kusala.m...pe0...  sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m animitta.m chandaadhipateyyanti ^a^"V0.0144"^ea^  vipaako...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m appa.nihita.m  chandaadhipateyyanti kusala.m...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m  chandaadhipateyyanti vipaako, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  ^a^"P0.0116"^ea^avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1098: [03]552^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  lokuttara.m magga.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m satipa.t.thaana.m bhaaveti...pe0...  lokuttara.m sammappadhaana.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m ^a^"T0.0171"^ea^iddhipaada.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m indriya.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m bala.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m bojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m sacca.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m samatha.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m dhamma.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m khandha.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m aayatana.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m dhaatu.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m aahaara.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m phassa.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m vedana.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m sa~n~na.m bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m cetana.m  bhaaveti...pe0... lokuttara.m citta.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m  di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m  dandhaabhi~n~na.m chandaadhipateyya.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa  kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m  dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m...pe0... animitta.m...pe0... appa.nihita.m  chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1101: [03]553^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m kaamaraagabyaapaadaana.m  ^a^"M0.0135"^ea^tanubhaavaaya dutiyaaya ^a^"T0.0172"^ea^bhuumiyaa pattiyaa...pe0... kaamaraa  gabyaapaadaana.m ^a^"P0.0117"^ea^^a^"V0.0145"^ea^anavasesappahaanaaya tatiyaaya bhuumiyaa  pattiyaa...pe0... ruuparaagaaruuparaagamaanauddhaccaavijjaaya  anavasesappahaanaaya catutthaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m  dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... a~n~nindriya.m  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.  tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... a~n~naataavindriya.m hoti...pe0... avikkhepo  hoti...pe0... ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1102: [03]554^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0....
text.1103: [03]555^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye a~n~naataavindriya.m hoti?  yaa tesa.m a~n~naataaviina.m dhammaana.m a~n~naa pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo  pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m  kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m ^a^"T0.0173"^ea^ amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye a~n~naataavindriya.m hoti...pe0...  ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino  dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1108: [03]556^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0136"^ea^^a^"V0.0146"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m  samaye akusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaaka.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m  uppanna.m hoti upekkhaasahagata.m ruupaaramma.na.m...pe0... sotavi~n~naa.na.m uppanna.m  hoti upekkhaasahagata.m saddaaramma.na.m...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m uppanna.m hoti  upekkhaasahagata.m gandhaaramma.na.m ^a^"P0.0118"^ea^...pe0... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m  uppanna.m hoti upekkhaasahagata.m rasaaramma.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m uppanna.m  hoti dukkhasahagata.m pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti,  vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, dukkha.m hoti,  cittassekaggataa hoti, manindriya.m hoti, dukkhindriya.m hoti,  jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1109: [03]557^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti.
text.111: [03](kha) saasavaa ceva dhammaa no ca  aasavaa.
text.1110: [03]558^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaakaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m ^a^"T0.0174"^ea^kaayika.m asaata.m kaayika.m  dukkha.m kaayasamphassaja.m asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa asaataa  dukkhaa vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti...pe0....
text.1111: [03]559^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye dukkha.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye kaayika.m asaata.m kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayasamphassaja.m asaata.m dukkha.m  vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  dukkha.m hoti...pe0....
text.1112: [03]560^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye dukkhindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye kaayika.m asaata.m kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayasamphassaja.m asaata.m  dukkha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa ^a^"V0.0147"^ea^-- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye dukkhindriya.m hoti...pe0... ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi  atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1113: [03]tasmi.m ^a^"M0.0137"^ea^kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti,  dvaayatanaani honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti,  tii.nindriyaani honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa  kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti, eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu  hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa  aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1114: [03]561^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa cittassekaggataa jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa  vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m  ^a^"P0.0119"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho ^a^"T0.0175"^ea^hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1117: [03]562^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  akusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaakaa manodhaatu uppannaa  hoti upekkhaasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa vaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaaramma.naa vaa ya.m  ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa  hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti,  upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti, manindriya.m hoti,  upekkhindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1118: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo ^a^"V0.0148"^ea^aahaaraa honti, tii.nindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa manodhaatu hoti, eka.m  dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1119: [03]563^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0138"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti? phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro  cittassekaggataa jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi  atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa  sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m ^a^"T0.0176"^ea^-- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1122: [03]564^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  akusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaakaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  uppannaa hoti upekkhaasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.naa  vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti,  sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vitakko hoti, vicaaro  hoti, upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti, manindriya.m hoti,  upekkhindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1123: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, tii.nindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti  ^a^"P0.0120"^ea^, eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa  pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa --  ime dhammaa abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1124: [03]565^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0149"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro cittassekaggataa jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa  pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa  .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m ^a^"T0.0177"^ea^.thapetvaa ^a^"M0.0139"^ea^sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa  vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1129: [03]566^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  manodhaatu uppannaa hoti kiriyaa neva kusalaa naakusalaa na ca  kammavipaakaa upekkhaasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa vaa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaaramma.naa  vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti,  sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vitakko hoti, vicaaro  hoti, upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti, manindriya.m hoti,  upekkhindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.113: [03](kha) aasavasampayuttaa ceva dhammaa no  ca aasavaa.
text.1130: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, tii.nindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa manodhaatu hoti, eka.m  dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1131: [03]567^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa vitakko ^a^"T0.0178"^ea^vicaaro cittassekaggataa ^a^"V0.0150"^ea^jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa  pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa  .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1134: [03]568^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0140"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m  samaye manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu uppannaa hoti kiriyaa neva ^a^"P0.0121"^ea^ kusalaa naakusalaa na ca kammavipaakaa somanassasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa  vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.naa vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, piiti hoti, sukha.m hoti,  cittassekaggataa hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti, samaadhindriya.m hoti,  manindriya.m hoti, somanassindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye  vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa  -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1135: [03]569^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0....
text.1136: [03]570^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.1137: [03]571^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyindriya.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo ^a^"T0.0179"^ea^ vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa ^a^"V0.0151"^ea^  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyindriya.m hoti.
text.1138: [03]572^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m --  ida.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti...pe0... ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1139: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, pa~ncindriyaani  honti, eko ^a^"M0.0141"^ea^phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti, eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu  hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa  aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1140: [03]573^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro piiti cittassekaggataa viiriyindriya.m  samaadhindriya.m jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa ^a^"P0.0122"^ea^vedanaakkhandha.m  .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1143: [03]574^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0180"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu uppannaa hoti kiriyaa neva kusalaa naakusalaa na ca  kammavipaakaa upekkhaasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.naa  vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti,  sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vitakko hoti, vicaaro  hoti, upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa ^a^"V0.0152"^ea^hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti,  samaadhindriya.m hoti manindriya.m hoti, upekkhindriya.m hoti,  jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1144: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, pa~ncindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti,  eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.1145: [03]575^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0142"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti? phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro  cittassekaggataa viiriyindriya.m samaadhindriya.m jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa pana  tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa  vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime ^a^"T0.0181"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1149: [03]576^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu uppannaa hoti kiriyaa neva kusalaa naakusalaa na ca  kammavipaakaa somanassasahagataa ~naa.nasampayuttaa...pe0...  somanassasahagataa ~naa.nasampayuttaa sasa"nkhaarena...pe0...  somanassasahagataa ~naa.navippayuttaa...pe0... somanassasahagataa  ~naa.navippayuttaa sasa"nkhaarena...pe0... upekkhaasahagataa  ~naa.nasampayuttaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagataa ~naa.nasampayuttaa  sasa"nkhaarena...pe0... upekkhaasahagataa ~naa.navippayuttaa...pe0...  upekkhaasahagataa ~naa.navippayuttaa sasa"nkhaarena ruupaaramma.naa vaa...pe0...  dhammaaramma.naa vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha ^a^"P0.0123"^ea^, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti ^a^"V0.0153"^ea^...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0... alobho abyaakatamuula.m...pe0... adoso  abyaakatamuula.m...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1152: [03]577^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  ruupaavacara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti kiriya.m neva kusala.m naakusala.m na ca  kammavipaaka.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati pathaviikasi.na.m, tasmi.m ^a^"M0.0143"^ea^samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1153: [03]578^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0182"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  ruupaavacara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti kiriya.m neva kusala.m naakusala.m na ca  kammavipaaka.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0...  dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m...pe0... pa~ncama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati pathaviikasi.na.m,  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime  dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1156: [03]579^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupaavacara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti kiriya.m neva kusala.m naakusala.m na ca  kammavipaaka.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa  pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa  aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m ^a^"V0.0154"^ea^sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1157: [03]580^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupaavacara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti kiriya.m neva ^a^"P0.0124"^ea^kusala.m naakusala.m  na ca kammavipaaka.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca  pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo ^a^"T0.0183"^ea^hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1158: [03]581^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupaavacara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti kiriya.m neva kusala.m naakusala.m na ca  kammavipaaka.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca  pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati ^a^"M0.0144"^ea^,  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime  dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1159: [03]582^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupaavacara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti kiriya.m neva kusala.m naakusala.m na ca  kammavipaaka.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca  pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0... alobho abyaakatamuula.m...pe0... adoso  abyaakatamuula.m...pe0... amoho abyaakatamuula.m...pe0... ime dhammaa  abyaakataa.
text.1165: [03]583^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0184"^ea^^a^"M0.0145"^ea^^a^"V0.0155"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? kusalaakusalaana.m dhammaana.m vipaakaa  kaamaavacaraa ruupaavacaraa aruupaavacaraa apariyaapannaa vedanaakkhandho sa~n~naakkhandho sa"nkhaarakkhandho  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho, ye ca dhammaa kiriyaa neva kusalaa naakusalaa na ca kammavipaakaa,  sabba~nca ruupa.m, asa"nkhataa ca dhaatu -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.1168: [03]584^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m sabba.m ruupa.m? cattaaro ca mahaabhuutaa, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  ruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati sabba.m ruupa.m. sabba.m ruupa.m na hetu, ahetuka.m, hetuvippayutta.m,  sappaccaya.m ^a^"P0.0125"^ea^, sa"nkhata.m, ruupa.m ^v{ruupiya.m (sii0)}v^, lokiya.m, saasava.m, sa.myojaniya.m, ganthaniya.m, oghaniya.m,  yoganiya.m, niivara.niya.m, paraama.t.tha.m, upaadaaniya.m, sa.mkilesika.m, abyaakata.m, anaaramma.na.m,  acetasika.m, cittavippayutta.m, nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamma.m, asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesika.m,  na savitakkasavicaara.m, na avitakkavicaaramatta.m, avitakkaavicaara.m, na piitisahagata.m,  na sukhasahagata.m, na upekkhaasahagata.m, neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m, neva dassanena  na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m, neva aacayagaami na apacayagaami, nevasekkhanaasekkha.m, paritta.m,  kaamaavacara.m, na ruupaavacara.m, na ^a^"V0.0156"^ea^aruupaavacara.m, pariyaapanna.m, no apariyaapanna.m, aniyata.m,  aniyyaanika.m, uppanna.m, chahi vi~n~naa.nehi vi~n~neyya.m, anicca.m, jaraabhibhuuta.m.

text.1319: [03]594^b^.^eb^ sabba.m ^a^"M0.0156"^ea^ruupa.m na hetumeva, ahetukameva, hetuvippayuttameva, sappaccayameva,  sa"nkhatameva, ruupameva, lokiyameva, saasavameva, sa.myojaniyameva, ganthaniyameva, oghaniyameva,  yoganiyameva, niivara.niyameva, paraama.t.thameva, upaadaaniyameva, sa.mkilesikameva, abyaakatameva,  anaaramma.nameva, acetasikameva, cittavippayuttameva, nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammameva,  asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikameva, na savitakkasavicaarameva, na avitakkavicaaramattameva, avitakkaavicaarameva   ^a^"T0.0195"^ea^,  na piitisahagatameva, na sukhasahagatameva, na upekkhaasahagatameva, neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbameva,  neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukameva, neva aacayagaami na apacayagaamimeva, nevasekkhanaasekkhameva,  parittameva, kaamaavacarameva, na ruupaavacarameva, na aruupaavacarameva, pariyaapannameva, no apariyaapannameva,  aniyatameva, aniyyaanikameva, uppanna.m chahi vi~n~naa.nehi vi~n~neyyameva, aniccameva,  jaraabhibhuutameva.
text.1324: [03]595^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0134"^ea^^a^"V0.0170"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa? cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m,  jivhaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, itthindriya.m,  purisindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, kaayavi~n~natti, vaciivi~n~natti, aakaasadhaatu,  ruupassa lahutaa, ruupassa mudutaa, ruupassa kamma~n~nataa, ruupassa upacayo, ruupassa santati, ruupassa  jarataa, ruupassa aniccataa, kaba.liikaaro aahaaro.
text.1325: [03]596^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0157"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m cakkhaayatana.m? ya.m cakkhu ^v{cakkhu.m (sii0  syaa0)}v^ catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yena cakkhunaa anidassanena sappa.tighena  ruupa.m sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m passi vaa passati vaa passissati vaa passe vaa, cakkhu.m  peta.m cakkhaayatana.m peta.m cakkhudhaatu pesaa cakkhundriya.m peta.m loko peso dvaaraa pesaa  samuddo peso pa.n.dara.m peta.m khetta.m peta.m vatthu.m peta.m netta.m peta.m nayana.m peta.m orima.m   ^a^"T0.0196"^ea^tiira.m peta.m su~n~no gaamopeso -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m cakkhaayatana.m.
text.1326: [03]597^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m cakkhaayatana.m? ya.m cakkhu catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado  attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi  ruupa.m sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne  vaa, cakkhu.m peta.m cakkhaayatana.m peta.m cakkhudhaatu pesaa cakkhundriya.m peta.m loko peso  dvaaraa pesaa samuddo peso pa.n.dara.m peta.m khetta.m peta.m vatthu.m peta.m netta.m peta.m  nayana.m peta.m orima.m tiira.m peta.m su~n~no gaamo peso -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m cakkhaayatana.m.
text.1327: [03]598^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m cakkhaayatana.m? ya.m cakkhu catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado  attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m cakkhu anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m ruupamhi  sanidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa,  cakkhu.m peta.m cakkhaayatana.m peta.m cakkhudhaatu pesaa cakkhundriya.m peta.m loko peso  dvaaraa pesaa ^a^"V0.0171"^ea^samuddo peso pa.n.dara.m peta.m khetta.m peta.m vatthu.m peta.m netta.m peta.m  nayana.m peta.m orima.m tiira.m peta.m su~n~no gaamo peso -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m cakkhaayatana.m.

text.1345: [03]616^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m? ya.m ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa  sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m niila.m piitaka.m lohitaka.m odaata.m kaa.laka.m ma~nji.t.thaka.m ^v{ma~nje.t.thaka.m (sii0  syaa0)}v^ hari hariva.n.na.m amba"nkurava.n.na.m diigha.m rassa.m a.nu.m thuula.m va.t.ta.m parima.n.dala.m catura.msa.m ^v{caturassa.m  (sii0 ka0)}v^ cha.la.msa.m a.t.tha.msa.m so.lasa.msa.m ninna.m thala.m chaayaa aatapo aaloko andhakaaro abbhaa mahikaa  dhuumo rajo candama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa suuriyama.n.dalassa ^v{suriyama.n.dalassa (sii0 syaa0)}v^ va.n.nanibhaa taarakaruupaana.m ^a^"M0.0163"^ea^ va.n.nanibhaa aadaasama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa ma.nisa"nkhamuttaave.luriyassa va.n.nanibhaa jaataruuparajatassa  va.n.nanibhaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa  sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m, ya.m ruupa.m sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m cakkhunaa anidassanena sappa.tighena  passi vaa passati vaa passissati vaa passe vaa, ruupa.m peta.m ruupaayatana.m peta.m ruupadhaatu  pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m.

text.1347: [03]618^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m? ya.m ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa  sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m niila.m piitaka.m lohitaka.m odaata.m kaa.laka.m ma~nji.t.thaka.m  hari hariva.n.na.m amba"nkurava.n.na.m diigha.m rassa.m a.nu.m thuula.m va.t.ta.m parima.n.dala.m catura.msa.m  cha.la.msa.m a.t.tha.msa.m so.lasa.msa.m ninna.m thala.m chaayaa aatapo aaloko andhakaaro abbhaa mahikaa  dhuumo rajo candama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa suuriyama.n.dalassa ^a^"V0.0177"^ea^va.n.nanibhaa taarakaruupaana.m va.n.nanibhaa  aadaasama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa ma.nisa"nkhamuttaave.luriyassa va.n.nanibhaa jaataruuparajatassa va.n.nanibhaa,  ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m  sappa.tigha.m, ya.m ruupa.m sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi pa.tiha~n~ni  vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, ruupa.m peta.m ruupaayatana.m peta.m ruupadhaatu  pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m.
text.1348: [03]619^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0164"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m? ya.m ^a^"T0.0206"^ea^ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m niila.m piitaka.m lohitaka.m odaata.m kaa.laka.m  ma~nji.t.thaka.m hari hariva.n.na.m amba"nkurava.n.na.m diigha.m rassa.m a.nu.m thuula.m va.t.ta.m parima.n.dala.m  catura.msa.m cha.la.msa.m a.t.tha.msa.m so.lasa.msa.m ninna.m thala.m chaayaa aatapo aaloko andhakaaro  abbhaa mahikaa dhuumo rajo candama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa suuriyama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa taarakaruupaana.m  va.n.nanibhaa aadaasama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa ma.nisa"nkhamuttaave.luriyassa va.n.nanibhaa jaataruuparajatassa  va.n.nanibhaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa  sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m, ya.m ruupa.m aarabbha cakkhu.m nissaaya cakkhusamphasso uppajji  vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m ruupa.m aarabbha cakkhu.m nissaaya  cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0... cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m  uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m ruupaaramma.no cakkhu.m  nissaaya cakkhusamphasso uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0...  ya.m ruupaaramma.naa cakkhu.m nissaaya cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0...  cetanaa...pe0... cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje  vaa, ruupa.m peta.m ruupaayatana.m peta.m ruupadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupaayatana.m.
text.1349: [03]620^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m? yo saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya   ^a^"T0.0207"^ea^anidassano  sappa.tigho bherisaddo mudi"ngasaddo sa"nkhasaddo pa.navasaddo giitasaddo vaaditasaddo sammasaddo  paa.nisaddo sattaana.m nigghosasaddo dhaatuuna.m sannighaatasaddo vaatasaddo udakasaddo manussasaddo  amanussasaddo, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho, ya.m sadda.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m sotena anidassanena sappa.tighena su.ni vaa ^a^"V0.0178"^ea^  su.naati vaa su.nissati vaa su.ne vaa, saddo peso saddaayatana.m peta.m saddadhaatu pesaa --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m.
text.1350: [03]621^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m? yo ^a^"P0.0141"^ea^saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  anidassano sappa.tigho bherisaddo mudi"ngasaddo sa"nkhasaddo pa.navasaddo giitasaddo vaaditasaddo  sammasaddo paa.nisaddo sattaana.m nigghosasaddo dhaatuuna.m sannighaatasaddo vaatasaddo udakasaddo  manussasaddo amanussasaddo, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m ^a^"M0.0165"^ea^ upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, yamhi saddamhi anidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi sota.m anidassana.m  sappa.tigha.m pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, saddo peso  saddaayatana.m peta.m saddadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m.
text.1351: [03]622^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m? yo saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho bherisaddo mudi"ngasaddo sa"nkhasaddo pa.navasaddo giitasaddo vaaditasaddo sammasaddo  paa.nisaddo sattaana.m nigghosasaddo dhaatuuna.m sannighaatasaddo vaatasaddo udakasaddo   ^a^"T0.0208"^ea^manussasaddo  amanussasaddo, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho, yo saddo anidassano sappa.tigho sotamhi anidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi pa.tiha~n~ni  vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, saddo peso saddaayatana.m peta.m saddadhaatu  pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m.
text.1352: [03]623^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m? yo saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho bherisaddo mudi"ngasaddo sa"nkhasaddo pa.navasaddo giitasaddo vaaditasaddo sammasaddo  paa.nisaddo sattaana.m nigghosasaddo dhaatuuna.m sannighaatasaddo vaatasaddo udakasaddo manussasaddo  amanussasaddo, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho, ya.m sadda.m aarabbha sota.m nissaaya sotasamphasso uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa  uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m sadda.m aarabbha sota.m nissaaya sotasamphassajaa  vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0... sotavi~n~naa.na.m uppajji  vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m saddaaramma.no sota.m nissaaya  sotasamphasso uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m  saddaaramma.naa ^a^"V0.0179"^ea^sota.m nissaaya sotasamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0...  sotavi~n~naa.na.m uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa, saddo peso  saddaayatana.m peta.m saddadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ^a^"T0.0209"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m saddaayatana.m.
text.1353: [03]624^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m? yo gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho muulagandho saaragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho aamakagandho  vissagandho sugandho duggandho ^a^"M0.0166"^ea^, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi gandho catunna.m  mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m gandha.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m ghaanena  anidassanena sappa.tighena ghaayi vaa ghaayati vaa ghaayissati vaa ghaaye vaa, gandho peso  gandhaayatana.m peta.m gandhadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m.
text.1354: [03]625^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m? yo gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho muulagandho saaragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho aamakagandho  vissagandho sugandho duggandho, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m  upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, yamhi gandhamhi anidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi ghaana.m anidassana.m  sappa.tigha.m pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne ^a^"P0.0142"^ea^vaa,  gandho peso gandhaayatana.m peta.m gandhadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m.
text.1355: [03]626^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m? yo gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho muulagandho saaragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho aamakagandho  vissagandho sugandho duggandho, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m  upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, yo ^a^"T0.0210"^ea^gandho anidassano sappa.tigho ghaanamhi anidassanamhi  sappa.tighamhi pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, gandho peso  gandhaayatana.m peta.m gandhadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m.
text.1356: [03]627^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m? yo gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho muulagandho saaragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho aamakagandho  vissagandho sugandho duggandho, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m  upaadaaya ^a^"V0.0180"^ea^anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m gandha.m aarabbha ghaana.m nissaaya ghaanasamphasso uppajji  vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m gandha.m aarabbha ghaana.m nissaaya  ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m  uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m gandhaaramma.no  ghaana.m nissaaya ghaanasamphasso uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati ^a^"M0.0167"^ea^vaa  uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m gandhaaramma.naa ghaana.m nissaaya ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0...  sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati  vaa uppajje vaa, gandho peso gandhaayatana.m peta.m gandhadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m gandhaayatana.m.
text.1357: [03]628^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m? yo raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso ^a^"T0.0211"^ea^phalaraso ambila.m  madhura.m tittaka.m ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m khaarika.m lambila.m ^v{lapilaka.m (sii0)}v^ kasaavo saadu asaadu,  yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m  rasa.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m jivhaaya anidassanaaya sappa.tighaaya saayi vaa saayati vaa saayissati  vaa saaye vaa, raso peso rasaayatana.m peta.m rasadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m.
text.1358: [03]629^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m? yo raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambila.m  madhura.m tittaka.m ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m khaarika.m lambila.m kasaavo saadu asaadu,  yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, yamhi  rasamhi anidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi jivhaa anidassanaa sappa.tighaa pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati  vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, raso peso rasaayatana.m peta.m rasadhaatu pesaa --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m.
text.1359: [03]630^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0143"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m? yo raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  anidassano sappa.tigho muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso  ambila.m madhura.m tittaka.m ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m khaarika.m lambila.m kasaavo  saadu asaadu, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho, yo raso anidassano sappa.tigho jivhaaya ^a^"V0.0181"^ea^anidassanaaya sappa.tighaaya pa.tiha~n~ni  vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa ^a^"T0.0212"^ea^pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, raso peso rasaayatana.m peta.m rasadhaatu  pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m.
text.1360: [03]631^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0168"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m? yo raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  anidassano sappa.tigho muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso  ambila.m madhura.m tittaka.m ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m khaarika.m lambila.m kasaavo  saadu asaadu, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho, ya.m rasa.m aarabbha jivha.m nissaaya jivhaasamphasso uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa  uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m rasa.m aarabbha jivha.m nissaaya jivhaasamphassajaa  vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m uppajji  vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m rasaaramma.no jivha.m nissaaya  jivhaasamphasso uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0...  ya.m rasaaramma.naa jivha.m nissaaya jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0...  cetanaa...pe0... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje  vaa, raso peso rasaayatana.m peta.m rasadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m rasaayatana.m.
text.1361: [03]632^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m itthindriya.m? ya.m itthiyaa itthili"nga.m itthinimitta.m itthikutta.m  itthaakappo itthatta.m itthibhaavo ^v{itthitta.m itthiibhaavo (syaa0)}v^ -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m itthindriya.m.
text.1362: [03]633^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0213"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m purisindriya.m? ya.m purisassa purisali"nga.m purisanimitta.m purisakutta.m  purisaakappo purisatta.m purisabhaavo -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m purisindriya.m.
text.1363: [03]634^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m jiivitindriya.m? yo tesa.m ruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa  yaapanaa iriyanaa vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m jiivitindriya.m.
text.1364: [03]635^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m kaayavi~n~natti? yaa kusalacittassa vaa akusalacittassa vaa  abyaakatacittassa vaa abhikkamantassa vaa pa.tikkamantassa vaa aalokentassa vaa vilokentassa  vaa sami~njentassa vaa pasaarentassa vaa kaayassa thambhanaa santhambhanaa santhambhitatta.m vi~n~natti  vi~n~naapanaa vi~n~naapitatta.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m kaayavi~n~natti.
text.1365: [03]636^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0182"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m vaciivi~n~natti? yaa kusalacittassa vaa akusalacittassa vaa  abyaakatacittassa vaa vaacaa giraa byappatho udiira.na.m ghoso ghosakamma.m vaacaa vaciibhedo ^a^"P0.0144"^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati vaacaa. yaa taaya vaacaaya vi~n~natti vi~n~naapanaa vi~n~naapitatta.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m vaciivi~n~natti.
text.1366: [03]637^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0169"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m aakaasadhaatu? yo aakaaso aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m  vivaro vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m catuuhi mahaabhuutehi -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m aakaasadhaatu.
text.1367: [03]638^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0214"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa lahutaa? yaa ruupassa lahutaa lahupari.naamataa adandhanataa avitthanataa --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa lahutaa.
text.1368: [03]639^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa mudutaa? yaa ruupassa mudutaa maddavataa akakkha.lataa akathinataa --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa mudutaa.
text.1369: [03]640^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa kamma~n~nataa? yaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa kamma~n~natta.m kamma~n~nabhaavo --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa kamma~n~nataa.
text.1370: [03]641^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa upacayo? yo aayatanaana.m aacayo, so ruupassa upacayo -- ida.m  ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa upacayo.
text.1371: [03]642^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa santati? yo ruupassa upacayo, saa ruupassa santati -- ida.m ta.m  ruupa.m ruupassa santati.
text.1372: [03]643^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa jarataa? yaa ruupassa jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa  aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa jarataa.
text.1373: [03]644^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa aniccataa? yo ruupassa khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccataa  antaradhaana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa aniccataa.
text.1374: [03]645^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0183"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m kaba.liikaaro aahaaro? odano kummaaso sattu maccho  ma.msa.m khiira.m dadhi sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi  ruupa.m yamhi yamhi janapade tesa.m tesa.m ^a^"T0.0215"^ea^sattaana.m mukhaasiya.m dantavikhaadana.m galajjhohara.niiya.m  kucchivitthambhana.m, yaaya ojaaya sattaa yaapenti -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m kaba.liikaaro aahaaro.
text.1378: [03]646^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0170"^ea^^a^"P0.0145"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa? pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, aapodhaatu.
text.1379: [03]647^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m? pathaviidhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatu kakkha.la.m  muduka.m sa.nha.m pharusa.m sukhasamphassa.m dukkhasamphassa.m garuka.m lahuka.m, ya.m pho.t.thabba.m  anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m kaayena anidassanena sappa.tighena phusi vaa phusati vaa phusissati  vaa phuse vaa pho.t.thabbo peso pho.t.thabbaayatana.m peta.m pho.t.thabbadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m  ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m.
text.1380: [03]648^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m? pathaviidhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatu kakkha.la.m  muduka.m sa.nha.m pharusa.m sukhasamphassa.m dukkhasamphassa.m garuka.m lahuka.m, yamhi pho.t.thabbamhi  anidassanamhi sappa.tighamhi kaayo anidassano sappa.tigho pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa  pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, pho.t.thabbo peso pho.t.thabbaayatana.m peta.m pho.t.thabbadhaatu  pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m.
text.1381: [03]649^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m? pathaviidhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatu kakkha.la.m  muduka.m sa.nha.m pharusa.m sukhasamphassa.m dukkhasamphassa.m garuka.m lahuka.m, yo pho.t.thabbo  anidassano sappa.tigho kaayamhi anidassanamhi ^a^"T0.0216"^ea^sappa.tighamhi pa.tiha~n~ni vaa pa.tiha~n~nati vaa  pa.tiha~n~nissati vaa pa.tiha~n~ne vaa, pho.t.thabbo peso pho.t.thabbaayatana.m peta.m pho.t.thabbadhaatu  pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m.
text.1382: [03]650^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0184"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m? pathaviidhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatu kakkha.la.m  muduka.m sa.nha.m pharusa.m sukhasamphassa.m dukkhasamphassa.m garuka.m lahuka.m, ya.m pho.t.thabba.m  aarabbha kaaya.m nissaaya kaayasamphasso uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje  vaa...pe0... ya.m pho.t.thabba.m aarabbha kaaya.m nissaaya kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0...  sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa  uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m pho.t.thabbaaramma.no kaaya.m nissaaya kaayasamphasso  uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa...pe0... ya.m pho.t.thabbaaramma.naa  kaaya.m nissaaya kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0... sa~n~naa...pe0... cetanaa...pe0...  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m uppajji vaa uppajjati vaa uppajjissati vaa uppajje vaa, pho.t.thabbo  peso pho.t.thabbaayatana.m peta.m pho.t.thabbadhaatu pesaa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m.
text.1383: [03]651^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0171"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m aapodhaatu? ya.m ^a^"P0.0146"^ea^aapo aapogata.m  sineho sinehagata.m bandhanatta.m ruupassa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m aapodhaatu.
text.1385: [03]652^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0217"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m upaadi.n.na.m? cakkhaayatana.m sotaayatana.m ghaanaayatana.m jivhaayatana.m  kaayaayatana.m itthindriya.m purisindriya.m jiivitindriya.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi  ruupa.m kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu  aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadi.n.na.m.
text.1386: [03]653^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m anupaadi.n.na.m? saddaayatana.m kaayavi~n~natti vaciivi~n~natti ruupassa  lahutaa ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa jarataa ruupassa aniccataa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi  atthi ruupa.m na kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu  aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m anupaadi.n.na.m.
text.1387: [03]654^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0...   kaayaayatana.m itthindriya.m ^a^"V0.0185"^ea^purisindriya.m jiivitindriya.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m  gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo  ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m.
text.1388: [03]655^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m anupaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m? saddaayatana.m kaayavi~n~natti vaciivi~n~natti  ruupassa lahutaa ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa jarataa ruupassa aniccataa, ya.m vaa  pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m na kammassa katattaa, ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  ^a^"T0.0218"^ea^aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m anupaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m.

text.1437: [03]704^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m sotadhaatu...pe0... ghaanadhaatu...pe0... jivhaadhaatu...pe0...  kaayadhaatu? kaayaayatana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m kaayadhaatu.
text.1438: [03]705^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na kaayadhaatu? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na kaayadhaatu.
text.1439: [03]706^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupadhaatu? ruupaayatana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupadhaatu.
text.1440: [03]707^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na ruupadhaatu? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na ruupadhaatu.
text.1441: [03]708^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0191"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m saddadhaatu...pe0... gandhadhaatu...pe0... rasadhaatu...pe0...  pho.t.thabbadhaatu? pho.t.thabbaayatana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m pho.t.thabbadhaatu.
text.1442: [03]709^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na pho.t.thabbadhaatu? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na pho.t.thabbadhaatu.
text.1443: [03]710^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m cakkhundriya.m? ya.m cakkhu catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0...  su~n~no gaamo peso -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m cakkhundriya.m.
text.1444: [03]711^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na cakkhundriya.m? sotaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na cakkhundriya.m.
text.1445: [03]712^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0224"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m sotindriya.m...pe0... ghaanindriya.m...pe0... jivhindriya.m...pe0...  kaayindriya.m? yo kaayo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0... su~n~no  gaamo peso -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m kaayindriya.m.
text.1446: [03]713^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na kaayindriya.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na kaayindriya.m.
text.1447: [03]714^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m itthindriya.m? ya.m ^a^"P0.0152"^ea^itthiyaa itthili"nga.m itthinimitta.m  itthikutta.m itthaakappo itthatta.m itthibhaavo -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m itthindriya.m.
text.1448: [03]715^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0177"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m na itthindriya.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na itthindriya.m.
text.1449: [03]716^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0192"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m purisindriya.m? ya.m purisassa purisali"nga.m purisanimitta.m purisakutta.m  purisaakappo purisatta.m purisabhaavo -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m purisindriya.m.
text.1450: [03]717^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na purisindriya.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na purisindriya.m.
text.1451: [03]718^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m jiivitindriya.m? yo tesa.m ruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa  yaapanaa iriyanaa vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m jiivitindriya.m.
text.1452: [03]719^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na jiivitindriya.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na jiivitindriya.m.
text.1453: [03]720^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m kaayavi~n~natti? yaa kusalacittassa vaa akusalacittassa vaa  abyaakatacittassa vaa abhikkamantassa vaa pa.tikkamantassa vaa aalokentassa vaa vilokentassa  vaa sami~njentassa ^a^"T0.0225"^ea^vaa pasaarentassa vaa kaayassa thambhanaa santhambhanaa santhambhitatta.m vi~n~natti  vi~n~naapanaa vi~n~naapitatta.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m kaayavi~n~natti.
text.1454: [03]721^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na kaayavi~n~natti? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na kaayavi~n~natti.
text.1455: [03]722^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m vaciivi~n~natti? yaa kusalacittassa vaa akusalacittassa vaa  abyaakatacittassa vaa vaacaa giraa byappatho udiira.na.m ghoso ghosakamma.m vaacaa vaciibhedo,  aya.m vuccati vaacaa. yaa taaya vaacaaya vi~n~natti vi~n~naapanaa vi~n~naapitatta.m -- ida.m  ta.m ruupa.m vaciivi~n~natti.
text.1456: [03]723^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na vaciivi~n~natti? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na vaciivi~n~natti.
text.1457: [03]724^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m aakaasadhaatu? yo aakaaso aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m vivaro  vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m catuuhi mahaabhuutehi -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m aakaasadhaatu.
text.1458: [03]725^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0178"^ea^^a^"V0.0193"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m na aakaasadhaatu? cakkhaayatana.m  ^a^"P0.0153"^ea^...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na aakaasadhaatu.
text.1459: [03]726^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m aapodhaatu? ya.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m bandhanatta.m  ruupassa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m aapodhaatu.
text.1460: [03]727^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m na aapodhaatu? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na aapodhaatu.
text.1461: [03]728^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa lahutaa? yaa ruupassa lahutaa lahupari.naamataa adandhanataa avitthanataa --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa lahutaa ^a^"T0.0226"^ea^.
text.1462: [03]729^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na lahutaa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na lahutaa.
text.1463: [03]730^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa mudutaa? yaa ruupassa mudutaa maddavataa akakkha.lataa akathinataa --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa mudutaa.
text.1464: [03]731^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na mudutaa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na mudutaa.
text.1465: [03]732^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa kamma~n~nataa? yaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa kamma~n~natta.m kamma~n~nabhaavo --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa kamma~n~nataa.
text.1466: [03]733^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na kamma~n~nataa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na kamma~n~nataa.
text.1467: [03]734^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0194"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa upacayo? yo aayatanaana.m aacayo, so ruupassa upacayo -- ida.m  ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa upacayo.
text.1468: [03]735^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na upacayo? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na upacayo.
text.1469: [03]736^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa santati? yo ruupassa upacayo, saa ruupassa santati -- ida.m ta.m  ruupa.m ruupassa santati.
text.1470: [03]737^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na santati? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na santati.
text.1471: [03]738^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0179"^ea^^a^"P0.0154"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m   ruupassa jarataa? yaa ruupassa jaraa jiira.nataa  kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako ^a^"T0.0227"^ea^-- ida.m ta.m  ruupa.m ruupassa jarataa.
text.1472: [03]739^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na jarataa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na jarataa.
text.1473: [03]740^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa aniccataa? yo ruupassa khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccataa  antaradhaana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa aniccataa.
text.1474: [03]741^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na aniccataa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ruupassa na aniccataa.
text.1475: [03]742^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m kaba.liikaaro aahaaro? odano kummaaso sattu maccho  ma.msa.m khiira.m dadhi sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi  ruupa.m yamhi yamhi janapade tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m mukhaasiya.m dantavikhaadana.m galajjhohara.niiya.m  kucchivitthambhana.m, yaaya ojaaya sattaa yaapenti -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m kaba.liikaaro aahaaro.
text.1476: [03]743^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0195"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... ruupassa aniccataa --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro.
text.1480: [03]744^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m upaadaa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m upaadaa.
text.1481: [03]745^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m upaadaa? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m upaadaa.
text.1482: [03]746^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m no upaadaa? pho.t.thabbaayatana.m   ^a^"T0.0228"^ea^aapodhaatu -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m no upaadaa.
text.1483: [03]747^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0180"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m upaadi.n.na.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m upaadi.n.na.m.
text.1484: [03]748^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0155"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m upaadi.n.na.m? itthindriya.m purisindriya.m  jiivitindriya.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m  rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m upaadi.n.na.m.
text.1485: [03]749^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m anupaadi.n.na.m? saddaayatana.m kaayavi~n~natti vaciivi~n~natti  ruupassa ^a^"V0.0196"^ea^lahutaa ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa jarataa ruupassa aniccataa, ya.m vaa  pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m na kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m anupaadi.n.na.m.
text.1486: [03]750^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m. cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m.
text.1487: [03]751^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m? itthindriya.m purisindriya.m  jiivitindriya.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m  rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m.
text.1488: [03]752^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m anupaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m ^a^"T0.0229"^ea^? saddaayatana.m kaayavi~n~natti  vaciivi~n~natti ruupassa lahutaa ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa jarataa ruupassa aniccataa,  ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m na kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m anupaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m.

text.1498: [03]762^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na mahaabhuuta.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na mahaabhuuta.m.

text.1505: [03]769^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m? kaayavi~n~natti vaciivi~n~natti, ya.m  vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m cittaja.m cittahetuka.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupaayatana.m saddaayatana.m  gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa lahutaa  ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m.
text.1506: [03]770^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na cittasamu.t.thaana.m? itthindriya.m purisindriya.m  jiivitindriya.m ruupassa jarataa ruupassa aniccataa, ya.m ^a^"T0.0231"^ea^vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m na cittaja.m  na cittahetuka.m na cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupaayatana.m saddaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  aakaasadhaatu aapodhaatu ruupassa lahutaa ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa upacayo  ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na cittasamu.t.thaana.m.
text.1507: [03]771^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na cittasahabhu? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na cittasahabhu.

text.1585: [03]849^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na vaciivi~n~natti? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na vaciivi~n~natti.
text.1586: [03]850^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0165"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m vaciivi~n~natti? yaa kusalacittassa  vaa akusalacittassa vaa abyaakatacittassa vaa vaacaa giraa byappatho udiira.na.m dhoso ghosakamma.m  vaacaa vaciibhedo, aya.m vuccati vaacaa. yaa taaya vaacaaya vi~n~natti vi~n~naapanaa vi~n~naapitatta.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m vaciivi~n~natti ^a^"T0.0240"^ea^.
text.1587: [03]851^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na vaciivi~n~natti? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na vaciivi~n~natti.
text.1588: [03]852^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na aakaasadhaatu? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na aakaasadhaatu.
text.1589: [03]853^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m aakaasadhaatu? yo aakaaso aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m  vivaro vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m catuuhi mahaabhuutehi -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m aakaasadhaatu.
text.1590: [03]854^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0208"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na aakaasadhaatu? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na aakaasadhaatu.
text.1591: [03]855^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na aapodhaatu? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na aapodhaatu.
text.1592: [03]856^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m aapodhaatu? ya.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m  bandhanatta.m ruupassa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m aapodhaatu.
text.1593: [03]857^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na aapodhaatu? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na aapodhaatu.
text.1594: [03]858^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0190"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na lahutaa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na lahutaa.
text.1595: [03]859^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa lahutaa? yaa ruupassa lahutaa lahupari.naamataa adandhanataa  avitthanataa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa lahutaa.
text.1596: [03]860^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na lahutaa? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na lahutaa.
text.1597: [03]861^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0241"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na mudutaa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na mudutaa.
text.1598: [03]862^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa mudutaa? yaa ^a^"P0.0166"^ea^ruupassa mudutaa maddavataa  akakkha.lataa akathinataa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa mudutaa.
text.1599: [03]863^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0209"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na mudutaa? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na mudutaa.
text.1600: [03]864^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na kamma~n~nataa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na kamma~n~nataa.
text.1601: [03]865^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa kamma~n~nataa? yaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa kamma~n~natta.m  kamma~n~nabhaavo -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa kamma~n~nataa.
text.1602: [03]866^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na kamma~n~nataa? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na kamma~n~nataa.
text.1603: [03]867^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na upacayo? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na upacayo.
text.1604: [03]868^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa upacayo? yo aayatanaana.m aacayo, so ruupassa upacayo --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa upacayo.
text.1605: [03]869^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na upacayo? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na upacayo.
text.1606: [03]870^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na santati? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na santati.
text.1607: [03]871^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0242"^ea^^a^"M0.0191"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa santati? yo ruupassa upacayo, saa ruupassa  santati -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa santati.
text.1608: [03]872^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0210"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na santati? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na santati.
text.1609: [03]873^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na jarataa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na jarataa.
text.1610: [03]874^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa jarataa? yaa ruupassa jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m  valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa  jarataa.
text.1611: [03]875^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na jarataa? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na jarataa.
text.1612: [03]876^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0167"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na aniccataa? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ruupassa na aniccataa.
text.1613: [03]877^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa aniccataa? yo ruupassa khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo  aniccataa antaradhaana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa aniccataa.
text.1614: [03]878^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na aniccataa? ruupaayatana.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ruupassa na aniccataa.
text.1615: [03]879^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ^a^"T0.0243"^ea^.
text.1616: [03]880^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m kaba.liikaaro aahaaro? odano kummaaso sattu  maccho ma.msa.m khiira.m dadhi sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi  atthi ruupa.m yamhi yamhi ^a^"V0.0211"^ea^janapade tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m mukhaasiya.m dantavikhaadana.m galajjhohara.niiya.m  kucchivitthambhana.m yaaya ojaaya sattaa yaapenti -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro.
text.1617: [03]881^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0192"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro? ruupaayatana.m...pe0...  ruupassa aniccataa -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro.
text.1621: [03]882^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa upaadi.n.na.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m, itthindriya.m  purisindriya.m jiivitindriya.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m  gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro --  ida.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa upaadi.n.na.m.
text.1622: [03]883^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa anupaadi.n.na.m? saddaayatana.m kaayavi~n~natti vaciivi~n~natti  ruupassa lahutaa ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa jarataa ruupassa aniccataa, ya.m vaa  pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m na kammassa katattaa ^a^"P0.0168"^ea^ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m  aakaasadhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa  anupaadi.n.na.m.
text.1623: [03]884^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa upaadi.n.na.m? kammassa katattaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m aapodhaatu --  ida.m ^a^"T0.0244"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa upaadi.n.na.m.
text.1624: [03]885^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0212"^ea^ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa anupaadi.n.na.m? na kammassa katattaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  aapodhaatu -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa anupaadi.n.na.m.

text.1626: [03]887^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa anupaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m? saddaayatana.m kaayavi~n~natti vaciivi~n~natti  ruupassa lahutaa ruupassa mudutaa ruupassa kamma~n~nataa ruupassa ^a^"M0.0193"^ea^jarataa ruupassa aniccataa,  ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m na kammassa katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m  aakaasadhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa  anupaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m.
text.1627: [03]888^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m? kammassa katattaa pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  aapodhaatu -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa upaadi.n.nupaadaaniya.m.

text.1650: [03]911^b^.^eb^ katama.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadi.n.na.m na mahaabhuuta.m? cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m  itthindriya.m purisindriya.m jiivitindriya.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m kammassa  katattaa ruupaayatana.m gandhaayatana.m rasaayatana.m aakaasadhaatu ruupassa upacayo ruupassa santati  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadi.n.na.m na mahaabhuuta.m.
