text.2370: [03]1555^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0290"^ea^dhammaa upaadaaniyaa? tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, akusala.m, tiisu  bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa upaadaaniyaa.
text.2371: [03]1556^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa anupaadaaniyaa? cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa, cattaari ca saama~n~naphalaani,  nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa anupaadaaniyaa.
text.2372: [03]1557^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa upaadaanasampayuttaa? cattaaro di.t.thigatasampayuttalobhasahagatacittuppaadaa,  cattaaro di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppaadaa, etthuppanna.m lobha.m .thapetvaa -- ime  dhammaa upaadaanasampayuttaa.
text.2373: [03]1558^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa upaadaanavippayuttaa? catuusu di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatesu cittuppaadesu  uppanno lobho, dve domanassasahagatacittuppaadaa, vicikicchaasahagato cittuppaado,  uddhaccasahagato cittuppaado, catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu  bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa ^a^"T0.0371"^ea^upaadaanavippayuttaa.
text.2374: [03]1559^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa ca? taaneva upaadaanaani upaadaanaa ceva  upaadaaniyaa ca.
text.2375: [03]1560^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0319"^ea^dhammaa upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa? .thapetvaa upaadaane avasesa.m akusala.m,  tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, tiisu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m,  sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa ^a^"P0.0257"^ea^. anupaadaaniyaa  dhammaa na vattabbaa -- upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa caatipi, upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaatipi.
text.2376: [03]1561^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa ca? yattha di.t.thi ca lobho ca ekato  uppajjanti -- ime dhammaa upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa ca.
text.2377: [03]1562^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa? a.t.tha lobhasahagatacittuppaadaa,  etthuppanne upaadaane .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa.  upaadaanavippayuttaa dhammaa na vattabbaa -- upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa caatipi, upaadaanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca upaadaanaatipi.
text.2378: [03]1563^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0291"^ea^dhammaa upaadaanavippayuttaa upaadaaniyaa? catuusu   di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatesu cittuppaadesu uppanno lobho, dve domanassasahagatacittuppaadaa, vicikicchaasahagato  cittuppaado, uddhaccasahagato cittuppaado, tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, tiisu bhuumiisu  vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa upaadaanavippayuttaa  ^a^"T0.0372"^ea^upaadaaniyaa.
text.2379: [03]1564^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa upaadaanavippayuttaa anupaadaaniyaa? cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa,  cattaari ca saama~n~naphalaani, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa upaadaanavippayuttaa anupaadaaniyaa.  upaadaanasampayuttaa dhammaa na vattabbaa -- upaadaanavippayuttaa upaadaaniyaatipi, upaadaanavippayuttaa  anupaadaaniyaatipi.
text.2381: [03]1565^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kilesaa? dasa kilesavatthuuni -- lobho, doso, moho, maano,  di.t.thi, vicikicchaa, thina.m, uddhacca.m, ahirika.m, anottappa.m. lobho a.t.thasu  lobhasahagatesu cittuppaadesu ^a^"V0.0320"^ea^uppajjati. doso dviisu domanassasahagatesu cittuppaadesu  uppajjati. moho sabbaakusalesu uppajjati. maano catuusu di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatesu  cittuppaadesu uppajjati. di.t.thi catuusu di.t.thigatasampayuttesu cittuppaadesu uppajjati.  vicikicchaa vicikicchaasahagatesu cittuppaadesu uppajjati. thina.m sasa"nkhaarikesu  akusalesu uppajjati. uddhacca~nca ahirika~nca anottappa~nca sabbaakusalesu uppajjanti --  ime dhammaa kilesaa.
text.2382: [03]1566^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa no kilesaa? .thapetvaa ^a^"P0.0258"^ea^kilese avasesa.m akusala.m,  catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m,  ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa no kilesaa.
text.2383: [03]1567^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa? tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, akusala.m, tiisu bhuumiisu  vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime ^a^"T0.0373"^ea^dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa.
text.2384: [03]1568^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa asa.mkilesikaa? cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa, cattaari ca  saama~n~naphalaani, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa asa.mkilesikaa.
text.2385: [03]1569^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0292"^ea^dhammaa sa.mkili.t.thaa? dvaadasa akusalacittuppaadaa -- ime  dhammaa sa.mkili.t.thaa.
text.2386: [03]1570^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa asa.mkili.t.thaa? catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako,  tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa asa.mkili.t.thaa.
text.2387: [03]1571^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kilesasampayuttaa? dvaadasa akusalacittuppaadaa -- ime dhammaa  kilesasampayuttaa.
text.2388: [03]1572^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kilesavippayuttaa? catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu  vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa kilesavippayuttaa.
text.2389: [03]1573^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0321"^ea^dhammaa kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa ca? teva kilesaa kilesaa ceva  sa.mkilesikaa ca.
text.239: [03](kha) upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva dhammaa  no ca upaadaanaa.
text.2390: [03]1574^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa? .thapetvaa kilese avasesa.m  akusala.m, tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, tiisu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m,  sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa. asa.mkilesikaa  dhammaa na vattabbaa -- kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa caatipi, sa.mkilesikaa ceva  no ca kilesaatipi.
text.2391: [03]1575^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa ca? teva kilesaa kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa  ca.
text.2392: [03]1576^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa? .thapetvaa kilese avasesa.m  akusala.m -- ime dhammaa sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa ^a^"T0.0374"^ea^. asa.mkili.t.thaa dhammaa na  vattabbaa -- kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caatipi, sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaatipi.
text.2393: [03]1577^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"P0.0259"^ea^dhammaa kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa ca? yattha dve tayo  kilesaa ekato uppajjanti -- ime dhammaa kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa ca.
text.2394: [03]1578^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0293"^ea^dhammaa kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa? .thapetvaa  kilese avasesa.m akusala.m -- ime dhammaa kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa.  kilesavippayuttaa dhammaa na vattabbaa -- kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa caatipi, kilesasampayuttaa  ceva no ca kilesaatipi.
text.2395: [03]1579^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kilesavippayuttaa sa.mkilesikaa? tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m,  tiisu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa  kilesavippayuttaa sa.mkilesikaa.
text.2396: [03]1580^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kilesavippayuttaa asa.mkilesikaa? cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa  ^a^"V0.0322"^ea^, cattaari ca saama~n~naphalaani, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa kilesavippayuttaa asa.mkilesikaa.  kilesasampayuttaa dhammaa na vattabbaa -- kilesavippayuttaa sa.mkilesikaatipi, kilesavippayuttaa  asa.mkilesikaatipi.
text.2398: [03]1581^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa dassanena pahaatabbaa? cattaaro di.t.thigatasampayuttacittuppaadaa, vicikicchaasahagato  cittuppaado -- ime dhammaa dassanena pahaatabbaa. cattaaro di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppaadaa,  dve domanassasahagatacittuppaadaa -- ime dhammaa ^a^"T0.0375"^ea^siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa na dassanena  pahaatabbaa.
text.2399: [03]1582^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na dassanena pahaatabbaa? uddhaccasahagato cittuppaado, catuusu bhuumiisu  kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca --  ime dhammaa na dassanena pahaatabbaa.
text.2400: [03]1583^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa? uddhaccasahagato cittuppaado -- ime dhammaa  bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. cattaaro di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppaadaa, dve domanassasahagatacittuppaadaa --  ime dhammaa siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa.
text.2401: [03]1584^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0294"^ea^dhammaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa? cattaaro di.t.thigatasampayuttacittuppaadaa,  vicikicchaasahagato cittuppaado, catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako,  tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa.
text.2402: [03]1585^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"P0.0260"^ea^dhammaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa? cattaaro di.t.thigatasampayuttacittuppaadaa,  vicikicchaasahagato cittuppaado, etthuppanna.m moha.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa dassanena  pahaatabbahetukaa. cattaaro di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppaadaa, dve domanassasahagatacittuppaadaa --  ime dhammaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa.
text.2403: [03]1586^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0323"^ea^dhammaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa? vicikicchaasahagato moho,  uddhaccasahagato cittuppaado, catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu   ^a^"T0.0376"^ea^bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa.
text.2404: [03]1587^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa? uddhaccasahagato cittuppaado, etthuppanna.m  moha.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. cattaaro di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppaadaa,  dve domanassasahagatacittuppaadaa -- ime dhammaa siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa  na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.
text.2405: [03]1588^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa? cattaaro di.t.thigatasampayuttacittuppaadaa,  vicikicchaasahagato cittuppaado, uddhaccasahagato moho, catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m,  catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca --  ime dhammaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.
text.2406: [03]1589^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa savitakkaa? kaamaavacarakusala.m, akusala.m, kaamaavacarakusalassa  vipaakato ekaadasa cittuppaadaa, akusalassa vipaakato dve, kiriyato ekaadasa,  ruupaavacara.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca lokuttara.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m  kusalato ca vipaakato ca, etthuppanna.m vitakka.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa savitakkaa.
text.2407: [03]1590^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0295"^ea^dhammaa avitakkaa? dvepa~ncavi~n~naa.naani,  ruupaavacaratikacatukkajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, cattaaro aruupaavacaraa kusalato ca vipaakato  ca kiriyato ca, lokuttaratikacatukkajjhaanaa ^a^"T0.0377"^ea^kusalato ca vipaakato ca, vitakko  ca, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa avitakkaa.
text.2408: [03]1591^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa savicaaraa? kaamaavacarakusala.m ^a^"P0.0261"^ea^, akusala.m, kaamaavacarakusalassa  vipaakato ekaadasa cittuppaadaa, akusalassa vipaakato dve kiriyato ekaadasa, ruupaavacaraekakadukajjhaanaa  kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, lokuttaraekakadukajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato  ca, etthuppanna.m vicaara.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa savicaaraa.
text.2409: [03]1592^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0324"^ea^dhammaa avicaaraa? dvepa~ncavi~n~naa.naani, ruupaavacaratikatikajjhaanaa kusalato  ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, cattaaro aaruppaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato  ca, lokuttaratikatikajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca, vicaaro ca, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca --  ime dhammaa avicaaraa.
text.2410: [03]1593^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa sappiitikaa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro somanassasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato cattaaro, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato pa~nca, kiriyato pa~nca, ruupaavacaradukatikajjhaanaa  kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, lokuttaradukatikajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato  ca, etthuppanna.m piiti.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa sappiitikaa.
text.2411: [03]1594^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa appiitikaa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro upekkhaasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato a.t.tha, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato ekaadasa, akusalassa vipaakato satta,  kiriyato cha, ruupaavacaradukadukajjhaanaa kusalato ^a^"T0.0378"^ea^ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, cattaaro  aaruppaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, lokuttaradukadukajjhaanaa  kusalato ca vipaakato ca piiti ca, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa appiitikaa.
text.2412: [03]1595^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0296"^ea^dhammaa piitisahagataa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro somanassasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato cattaaro, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato pa~nca, kiriyato pa~nca, ruupaavacaradukatikajjhaanaa  kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, lokuttaradukatikajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato  ca, etthuppanna.m piiti.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa piitisahagataa.
text.2413: [03]1596^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na piitisahagataa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro upekkhaasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato a.t.tha, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato ekaadasa, akusalassa vipaakato satta,  kiriyato cha, ruupaavacaradukadukajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, cattaaro  aaruppaa kusalato ca ^a^"P0.0262"^ea^vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, lokuttaradukadukajjhaanaa ^a^"V0.0325"^ea^  kusalato ca vipaakato ca, piiti ca, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa na piitisahagataa.
text.2414: [03]1597^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa sukhasahagataa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro somanassasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato cattaaro, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato cha, kiriyato pa~nca, ruupaavacaratikacatukkajjhaanaa  kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca lokuttaratikacatukkajjhaanaa kusalato ca  vipaakato ca, etthuppanna.m sukha.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa ^a^"T0.0379"^ea^sukhasahagataa.
text.2415: [03]1598^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na sukhasahagataa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro upekkhaasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato a.t.tha, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato dasa, akusalassa vipaakato satta, kiriyato  cha, ruupaavacara.m catuttha.m jhaana.m kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, cattaaro aaruppaa  kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca lokuttara.m catuttha.m jhaana.m kusalato ca vipaakato  ca, sukha~nca, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa na sukhasahagataa.
text.2416: [03]1599^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa upekkhaasahagataa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro upekkhaasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato cha, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato dasa, akusalassa vipaakato cha, kiriyato  cha ^a^"M0.0297"^ea^, ruupaavacara.m catuttha.m jhaana.m kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca,  cattaaro aaruppaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, lokuttara.m catuttha.m  jhaana.m kusalato ca vipaakato ca, etthuppanna.m upekkha.m .thapetvaa -- ime dhammaa upekkhaasahagataa.
text.2417: [03]1600^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na upekkhaasahagataa? kaamaavacarakusalato cattaaro somanassasahagatacittuppaadaa,  akusalato cha, kaamaavacarakusalassa vipaakato cha, akusalassa vipaakato eko, kiriyato  pa~nca, ruupaavacaratikacatukkajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca kiriyato ca, lokuttaratikacatukkajjhaanaa  kusalato ca vipaakato ca, upekkhaa ca, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa na upekkhaasahagataa.
text.2418: [03]1601^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0326"^ea^dhammaa kaamaavacaraa? kaamaavacarakusala.m, akusala.m, sabbo   ^a^"T0.0380"^ea^kaamaavacarassa vipaako, kaamaavacarakiriyaabyaakata.m, sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa kaamaavacaraa.
text.2419: [03]1602^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na kaamaavacaraa? ruupaavacaraa ^a^"P0.0263"^ea^, aruupaavacaraa, apariyaapannaa --  ime dhammaa na kaamaavacaraa.
text.2420: [03]1603^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa ruupaavacaraa? ruupaavacaracatukkapa~ncakajjhaanaa kusalato ca vipaakato  ca kiriyato ca -- ime dhammaa ruupaavacaraa.
text.2421: [03]1604^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na ruupaavacaraa? kaamaavacaraa, aruupaavacaraa, apariyaapannaa -- ime  dhammaa na ruupaavacaraa.
text.2422: [03]1605^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa aruupaavacaraa? cattaaro aaruppaa kusalato ca vipaakato ca  kiriyato ca -- ime dhammaa aruupaavacaraa.
text.2423: [03]1606^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa na aruupaavacaraa? kaamaavacaraa, ruupaavacaraa, apariyaapannaa -- ime  dhammaa na aruupaavacaraa.
text.2424: [03]1607^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa pariyaapannaa? tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, akusala.m, tiisu bhuumiisu  vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa pariyaapannaa.
text.2425: [03]1608^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa apariyaapannaa? cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa, cattaari ca saama~n~naphalaani,  nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa apariyaapannaa.
text.2426: [03]1609^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0298"^ea^dhammaa niyyaanikaa? cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa -- ime  dhammaa niyyaanikaa.
text.2427: [03]1610^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa aniyyaanikaa? tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, akusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu  ^a^"V0.0327"^ea^vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa aniyyaanikaa.
text.2428: [03]1611^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0381"^ea^dhammaa niyataa? cattaaro di.t.thigatasampayuttacittuppaadaa, dve domanassasahagatacittuppaadaa --  ime dhammaa siyaa niyataa siyaa aniyataa. cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa -- ime dhammaa  niyataa.
text.2429: [03]1612^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa aniyataa? cattaaro di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppaadaa, vicikicchaasahagato  cittuppaado, uddhaccasahagato cittuppaado, tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu  vipaako, tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa aniyataa.
text.2430: [03]1613^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa sauttaraa? tiisu bhuumiisu kusala.m, akusala.m, tiisu bhuumiisu  vipaako, tiisu ^a^"P0.0264"^ea^bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ime dhammaa  sauttaraa.
text.2431: [03]1614^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa anuttaraa? cattaaro maggaa apariyaapannaa, cattaari ca saama~n~naphalaani,  nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa anuttaraa.
text.2432: [03]1615^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa sara.naa? dvaadasa akusalacittuppaadaa -- ime dhammaa sara.naa.
text.2433: [03]1616^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa ara.naa? catuusu bhuumiisu kusala.m, catuusu bhuumiisu vipaako,  tiisu bhuumiisu kiriyaabyaakata.m, ruupa~nca, nibbaana~nca -- ime dhammaa ara.naa.
text.253: [03](kha) sa.mkilesikaa ceva dhammaa no ca  kilesaa.
text.255: [03](kha) sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva dhammaa no ca  kilesaa.
text.257: [03](kha) kilesasampayuttaa ceva dhammaa no  ca kilesaa.
text.28: [03](ga) neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbaa dhammaa.
text.31: [03](ga) neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbahetukaa dhammaa.
text.390: [03]1^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0009"^ea^^a^"M0.0017"^ea^^a^"P0.0009"^ea^^a^"V0.0021"^ea^dhammaa kusalaa?  yasmi.m samaye kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti  somanassasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa  gandhaaramma.na.m vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m  ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa  hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti,  piiti hoti, sukha.m hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti, saddhindriya.m hoti,  viiriyindriya.m ^v{viriyindriya.m (sii0 syaa0)}v^ hoti, satindriya.m hoti, samaadhindriya.m hoti,  pa~n~nindriya.m hoti, manindriya.m hoti, somanassindriya.m hoti,  jiivitindriya.m hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti, sammaasa"nkappo hoti,  sammaavaayaamo hoti, sammaasati hoti, sammaasamaadhi hoti, saddhaabala.m  hoti, viiriyabala.m ^v{viriyabala.m (sii0 syaa0)}v^ hoti, satibala.m hoti, samaadhibala.m hoti,  pa~n~naabala.m hoti, hiribala.m hoti, ottappabala.m hoti, alobho hoti,  adoso hoti, amoho hoti, anabhijjhaa hoti, abyaapaado hoti,  sammaadi.t.thi hoti, hirii hoti, ottappa.m hoti, kaayapassaddhi ^v{kaayappassaddhi (syaa0)}v^ hoti,  cittapassaddhi ^v{cittappassaddhi (syaa0)}v^ hoti, kaayalahutaa hoti, cittalahutaa hoti, kaayamudutaa  hoti, cittamudutaa hoti, kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti, cittakamma~n~nataa  hoti, kaayapaagu~n~nataa hoti, cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti, kaayujukataa ^v{kaayujjukataa (sii0 ka0)}v^ hoti,  cittujukataa ^a^"T0.0010"^ea^^v{cittujjukataa (sii0 ka0)}v^ hoti, sati hoti, sampaja~n~na.m hoti, samatho hoti,  vipassanaa hoti, paggaaho hoti, avikkhepo hoti; ye vaa pana  tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime  dhammaa kusalaa.
text.391: [03]2^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0018"^ea^^a^"V0.0022"^ea^tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti.
text.392: [03]3^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m  cetosamphassaja.m saata.m ^a^"P0.0010"^ea^sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa  saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti.
text.393: [03]4^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa  sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti.
text.394: [03]5^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa  cetayitatta.m ^v{sa~ncetayitatta.m (syaa0)}v^ -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti.
text.395: [03]6^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m  vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m hoti.
text.396: [03]7^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye takko ^a^"T0.0011"^ea^vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti.
text.397: [03]8^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye caaro vicaaro anuvicaaro upavicaaro cittassa  anusandhaanataa anupekkhanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti.
text.398: [03]9^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti? yaa tasmi.m  samaye piiti paamojja.m aamodanaa pamodanaa haaso pahaaso vitti  odagya.m attamanataa cittassa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti.
text.399: [03]10^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0019"^ea^^a^"V0.0023"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sukha.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye sukha.m hoti.
text.400: [03]11^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.401: [03]12^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye saddhindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado ^a^"P0.0011"^ea^ saddhaa saddhindriya.m saddhaabala.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye saddhindriya.m hoti.
text.402: [03]13^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyindriya.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho ^v{viriyaarambho (sii0 syaa0)}v^ nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho ^a^"T0.0012"^ea^usso.lhii ^v{usso.lhi (sii0)}v^ thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  viiriyindriya.m hoti.
text.403: [03]14^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye satindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati --  ida.m tasmi.m samaye satindriya.m hoti.
text.404: [03]15^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti.
text.405: [03]16^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~nindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa ^a^"M0.0020"^ea^^a^"V0.0024"^ea^pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~nindriya.m  hoti.
text.406: [03]17^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m ^a^"T0.0013"^ea^vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.407: [03]18^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye somanassindriya.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye somanassindriya.m hoti.
text.408: [03]19^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti?  yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa iriyanaa ^v{iriiyanaa (sii0)}v^   ^a^"P0.0012"^ea^vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti.
text.409: [03]20^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi  hoti.
text.410: [03]21^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaasa"nkappo hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaasa"nkappo  hoti.
text.411: [03]22^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"T0.0014"^ea^^a^"M0.0021"^ea^^a^"V0.0025"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sammaavaayaamo  hoti? yo tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo  uyyaamo vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sammaavaayaamo hoti.
text.412: [03]23^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sammaasati hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaasati hoti.
text.413: [03]24^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaasamaadhi hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaasamaadhi hoti.
text.414: [03]25^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye saddhaabala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado saddhaa saddhindriya.m  saddhaabala.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye saddhaabala.m hoti.
text.415: [03]26^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyabala.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho ^a^"P0.0013"^ea^ viiriya.m viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- ida.m ^a^"T0.0015"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  viiriyabala.m hoti.
text.416: [03]27^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye satibala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati --  ida.m tasmi.m samaye satibala.m hoti.
text.417: [03]28^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhibala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhibala.m hoti.
text.418: [03]29^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0022"^ea^tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naabala.m  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo ^a^"V0.0026"^ea^pavicayo  dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m  nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naabala.m hoti.
text.419: [03]30^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye hiribala.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye hiriiyati hiriyitabbena hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye hiribala.m hoti.
text.420: [03]31^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye ottappabala.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye ottappati ^a^"T0.0016"^ea^ottappitabbena ottappati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye ottappabala.m  hoti.
text.421: [03]32^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye alobho hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye alobho alubbhanaa alubbhitatta.m asaaraago asaarajjanaa  asaarajjitatta.m anabhijjhaa alobho kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  alobho hoti.
text.422: [03]33^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye adoso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye adoso adussanaa adussitatta.m ^v{aduusanaa aduusitatta.m (syaa0)}v^ abyaapaado abyaapajjo  adoso kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye adoso hoti?
text.423: [03]34^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye amoho hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  ^a^"P0.0014"^ea^sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m  nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi amoho kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye amoho hoti.
text.424: [03]35^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0023"^ea^tasmi.m samaye anabhijjhaa  hoti? yo tasmi.m samaye alobho alubbhanaa ^a^"V0.0027"^ea^alubbhitatta.m asaaraago  asaarajjanaa asaarajjitatta.m anabhijjhaa alobho kusalamuula.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye anabhijjhaa hoti.
text.425: [03]36^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye abyaapaado hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye adoso ^a^"T0.0017"^ea^adussanaa adussitatta.m abyaapaado abyaapajjo  adoso kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye abyaapaado hoti.
text.426: [03]37^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi  hoti.
text.427: [03]38^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye hirii hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye hiriiyati hiriyitabbena hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye hirii hoti.
text.428: [03]39^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye ottappa.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye ottappa.m hoti.
text.429: [03]40^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayapassaddhi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  passaddhi pa.tipassaddhi ^v{pa.tippassaddhi (sii0 syaa0)}v^ passambhanaa   pa.tipassambhanaa ^v{pa.tippassambhanaa (sii0 syaa0)}v^   pa.tipassambhitatta.m ^v{pa.tippassambhitatta.m (sii0 syaa0)}v^ -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye kaayapassaddhi hoti.
text.430: [03]41^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittapassaddhi hoti? yaa  ^a^"P0.0015"^ea^tasmi.m samaye ^a^"T0.0018"^ea^vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa passaddhi pa.tipassaddhi  passambhanaa pa.tipassambhanaa pa.tipassambhitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  cittapassaddhi hoti.
text.431: [03]42^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0024"^ea^^a^"V0.0028"^ea^tasmi.m samaye kaayalahutaa  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa  sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa lahutaa lahupari.naamataa adandhanataa avitthanataa --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye kaayalahutaa hoti.
text.432: [03]43^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittalahutaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa lahutaa lahupari.naamataa adandhanataa  avitthanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittalahutaa hoti.
text.433: [03]44^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayamudutaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  mudutaa maddavataa akakkha.lataa akathinataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayamudutaa hoti.
text.434: [03]45^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittamudutaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa mudutaa maddavataa akakkha.lataa  akathinataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittamudutaa hoti.
text.435: [03]46^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  kamma~n~nataa kamma~n~natta.m kamma~n~nabhaavo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti.
text.436: [03]47^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"T0.0019"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cittakamma~n~nataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa kamma~n~nataa kamma~n~natta.m  kamma~n~nabhaavo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittakamma~n~nataa hoti.
text.437: [03]48^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayapaagu~n~nataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  pagu.nataa pagu.natta.m pagu.nabhaavo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye kaayapaagu~n~nataa  hoti.
text.438: [03]49^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa pagu.nataa pagu.natta.m pagu.nabhaavo --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti.
text.439: [03]50^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0029"^ea^tasmi.m samaye kaayujukataa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  ^a^"P0.0016"^ea^ujutaa ujukataa ajimhataa ava"nkataa aku.tilataa -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye kaayujukataa hoti.
text.440: [03]51^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0025"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cittujukataa  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa ujutaa ujukataa  ajimhataa ava"nkataa aku.tilataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittujukataa  hoti.
text.441: [03]52^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sati hoti? yaa tasmi.m  samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye sati hoti.
text.442: [03]53^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye sampaja~n~na.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa ^a^"T0.0020"^ea^pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye sampaja~n~na.m  hoti.
text.443: [03]54^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye samatho hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye samatho hoti.
text.444: [03]55^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vipassanaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vipassanaa  hoti.
text.445: [03]56^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0030"^ea^tasmi.m samaye paggaaho hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa ^a^"M0.0026"^ea^anikkhittadhurataa ^a^"T0.0021"^ea^dhurasampaggaaho  viiriya.m viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  paggaaho hoti.
text.446: [03]57^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"P0.0017"^ea^tasmi.m samaye avikkhepo  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti  avisaahaaro avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m  samaadhibala.m sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye avikkhepo hoti.
text.447: [03]ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa  aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.451: [03]58^b^.^eb^ tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti,  dvaayatanaani honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti,  a.t.thindriyaani honti, pa~nca"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti, pa~nca"ngiko maggo  hoti, satta balaani honti, tayo hetuu honti, eko phasso hoti,  ekaa vedanaa hoti, ekaa sa~n~naa hoti, ekaa cetanaa hoti, eka.m  citta.m hoti, eko vedanaakkhandho hoti, eko sa~n~naakkhandho hoti,  eko sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti, eko vi~n~naa.nakkhandho hoti, eka.m  manaayatana.m hoti, eka.m manindriya.m hoti, ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  hoti, eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana  tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime  dhammaa kusalaa.
text.452: [03]59^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0022"^ea^^a^"V0.0031"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti?  vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.453: [03]60^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandho hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m ^a^"M0.0027"^ea^vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandho hoti.
text.454: [03]61^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naakkhandho hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sa~n~naakkhandho hoti.
text.455: [03]62^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro piiti cittassekaggataa saddhindriya.m  ^a^"P0.0018"^ea^viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m  jiivitindriya.m sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati  sammaasamaadhi saddhaabala.m viiriyabala.m satibala.m samaadhibala.m pa~n~naabala.m  hiribala.m ottappabala.m alobho adoso amoho anabhijjhaa abyaapaado  sammaadi.t.thi hirii ottappa.m kaayapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kaayalahutaa  cittalahutaa kaayamudutaa cittamudutaa kaayakamma~n~nataa cittakamma~n~nataa  kaayapaagu~n~nataa cittapaagu~n~nataa kaayujukataa cittujukataa sati sampaja~n~na.m  samatho vipassanaa paggaaho avikkhepo; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa ^v{thapetvaa (ka0)}v^ vedanaakkhandha.m  .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti.
text.456: [03]63^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandho hoti ^a^"T0.0023"^ea^?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandho hoti.
text.458: [03]64^b^.^eb^ katamaani tasmi.m samaye dvaayatanaani honti?  manaayatana.m dhammaayatana.m.
text.459: [03]65^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0032"^ea^tasmi.m samaye manaayatana.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye manaayatana.m hoti.
text.460: [03]66^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0028"^ea^tasmi.m samaye dhammaayatana.m  hoti? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye dhammaayatana.m hoti.
text.462: [03]67^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye dve dhaatuyo honti?  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu.
text.463: [03]68^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti.
text.464: [03]69^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye dhammadhaatu hoti?  vedanaakkhandho, ^a^"P0.0019"^ea^sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye dhammadhaatu hoti.
text.466: [03]70^b^.^eb^ katame tasmi.m samaye tayo aahaaraa honti?  phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro ^a^"T0.0024"^ea^, vi~n~naa.naahaaro.
text.467: [03]71^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phassaahaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phassaahaaro hoti.
text.468: [03]72^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye manosa~ncetanaahaaro hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa sa~ncetanaa cetayitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye manosa~ncetanaahaaro hoti.
text.469: [03]73^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0033"^ea^tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.naahaaro hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.naahaaro hoti.
text.471: [03]74^b^.^eb^ katamaani ^a^"M0.0029"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  a.t.thindriyaani honti? saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m,  samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m, manindriya.m, somanassindriya.m,  jiivitindriya.m.
text.472: [03]75^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye saddhindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado saddhaa saddhindriya.m  saddhaabala.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye saddhindriya.m hoti.
text.473: [03]76^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyindriya.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  viiriyindriya.m hoti.
text.474: [03]77^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye satindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa ^a^"T0.0025"^ea^ apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati --  ida.m tasmi.m samaye satindriya.m hoti.
text.475: [03]78^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  ^a^"P0.0020"^ea^sammaasamaadhi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti.
text.476: [03]79^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~nindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa ^a^"V0.0034"^ea^pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~nindriya.m  hoti.
text.477: [03]80^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.478: [03]81^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0030"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  somanassindriya.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m  sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa  sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye somanassindriya.m hoti.
text.479: [03]82^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti?  yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa iriyanaa  vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  jiivitindriya.m hoti ^a^"T0.0026"^ea^.
text.481: [03]83^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye pa~nca"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti?  vitakko, vicaaro, piiti, sukha.m, cittassekaggataa.
text.482: [03]84^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti.
text.483: [03]85^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye caaro vicaaro anuvicaaro upavicaaro cittassa  anusandhaanataa anupekkhanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti.
text.484: [03]86^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0035"^ea^tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti? yaa  ^a^"P0.0021"^ea^tasmi.m samaye piiti paamojja.m aamodanaa pamodanaa haaso  pahaaso vitti odagya.m attamanataa cittassa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  piiti hoti.
text.485: [03]87^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye sukha.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m  vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  sukha.m hoti.
text.486: [03]88^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.488: [03]89^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0031"^ea^tasmi.m samaye pa~nca"ngiko  maggo hoti? sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati,  sammaasamaadhi.
text.489: [03]90^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m ^a^"T0.0027"^ea^samaye sammaadi.t.thi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi  hoti.
text.490: [03]91^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaasa"nkappo hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaasa"nkappo  hoti.
text.491: [03]92^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaavaayaamo hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho ^a^"V0.0036"^ea^nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sammaavaayaamo hoti.
text.492: [03]93^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sammaasati hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  ^a^"P0.0022"^ea^apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m  sammaasati -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaasati hoti.
text.493: [03]94^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaasamaadhi hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi ^a^"T0.0028"^ea^-- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaasamaadhi hoti.
text.495: [03]95^b^.^eb^ katamaani ^a^"M0.0032"^ea^tasmi.m samaye satta  balaani honti? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m,  pa~n~naabala.m, hiribala.m, ottappabala.m.
text.496: [03]96^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye saddhaabala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado saddhaa saddhindriya.m  saddhaabala.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye saddhaabala.m hoti.
text.497: [03]97^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyabala.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  viiriyabala.m hoti.
text.498: [03]98^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye satibala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati --  ida.m tasmi.m samaye satibala.m hoti.
text.499: [03]99^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0037"^ea^tasmi.m samaye samaadhibala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhibala.m hoti.
text.500: [03]100^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naabala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa ^a^"T0.0029"^ea^vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko ^a^"P0.0023"^ea^pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto  pa~n~naaratana.m amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  pa~n~naabala.m hoti.
text.501: [03]101^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye hiribala.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye hiriiyati hiriyitabbena hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye hiribala.m hoti.
text.502: [03]102^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0033"^ea^tasmi.m samaye ottappabala.m  hoti? ya.m tasmi.m samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati  paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  ottappabala.m hoti.
text.504: [03]103^b^.^eb^ katame tasmi.m samaye tayo hetuu honti?  alobho, adoso, amoho.
text.505: [03]104^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye alobho hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye alobho alubbhanaa alubbhitatta.m asaaraago asaarajjanaa  asaarajjitatta.m anabhijjhaa alobho kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  alobho hoti.
text.506: [03]105^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye adoso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye adoso adussanaa adussitatta.m ^a^"V0.0038"^ea^abyaapaado abyaapajjo  adoso kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye adoso hoti.
text.507: [03]106^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye amoho hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... ^a^"T0.0030"^ea^amoho dhammavicayo  sammaadi.t.thi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye amoho hoti.
text.509: [03]107^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye eko phasso hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye eko phasso hoti.
text.510: [03]108^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye ekaa vedanaa hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye ekaa vedanaa hoti.
text.511: [03]109^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye ekaa sa~n~naa hoti? yaa  ^a^"P0.0024"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye ekaa sa~n~naa hoti.
text.512: [03]110^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0034"^ea^tasmi.m samaye ekaa cetanaa  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa sa~ncetanaa cetayitatta.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye ekaa cetanaa hoti.
text.513: [03]111^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0031"^ea^tasmi.m samaye eka.m citta.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye eka.m citta.m hoti.
text.514: [03]112^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye eko vedanaakkhandho hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m  saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye eko vedanaakkhandho hoti.
text.515: [03]113^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0039"^ea^tasmi.m samaye eko sa~n~naakkhandho hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye eko sa~n~naakkhandho hoti.
text.516: [03]114^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye eko sa"nkhaarakkhandho  hoti? phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro piiti cittassekaggataa  saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m  jiivitindriya.m sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati  sammaasamaadhi saddhaabala.m viiriyabala.m satibala.m samaadhibala.m pa~n~naabala.m  hiribala.m ottappabala.m alobho adoso amoho anabhijjhaa abyaapaado  sammaadi.t.thi hirii ottappa.m kaayapassaddhi cittapassaddhi kaayalahutaa  cittalahutaa kaayamudutaa cittamudutaa kaayakamma~n~nataa cittakamma~n~nataa  kaayapaagu~n~nataa cittapaagu~n~nataa kaayujukataa cittujukataa sati sampaja~n~na.m  samatho vipassanaa ^a^"T0.0032"^ea^paggaaho avikkhepo; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m  .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  eko sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti.
text.517: [03]115^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye eko vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  hoti? ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano  manaayatana.m manindriya.m ^a^"M0.0035"^ea^vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye eko vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  hoti.
text.518: [03]116^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0025"^ea^tasmi.m samaye eka.m  manaayatana.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m  mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye eka.m manaayatana.m hoti.
text.519: [03]117^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye eka.m manindriya.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye eka.m manindriya.m hoti.
text.520: [03]118^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  hoti? ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano ^a^"V0.0040"^ea^maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano  manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti.
text.521: [03]119^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti?  vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho ^a^"T0.0033"^ea^, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti.
text.522: [03]120^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti?  vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti.
text.523: [01]ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa  aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.526: [03]121^b^.^eb^ tasmi.m kho pana samaye dhammaa honti, khandhaa  honti, aayatanaani honti, dhaatuyo honti, aahaaraa honti,  indriyaani ^a^"M0.0036"^ea^honti, jhaana.m hoti, maggo hoti, balaani  honti, hetuu honti, phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti,  cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vedanaakkhandho hoti, sa~n~naakkhandho hoti,  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho hoti, manaayatana.m hoti,  manindriya.m hoti, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti, dhammaayatana.m hoti,  dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.527: [03]122^b^.^eb^ katame tasmi.m samaye dhammaa honti?  vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho --  ime tasmi.m samaye dhammaa honti.
text.528: [03]123^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0041"^ea^tasmi.m samaye khandhaa honti?  vedanaakkhandho, ^a^"P0.0026"^ea^sa~n~naakkhandho ^a^"T0.0034"^ea^, sa"nkhaarakkhandho,  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- ime tasmi.m samaye khandhaa honti.
text.529: [03]124^b^.^eb^ katamaani tasmi.m samaye aayatanaani honti?  manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m -- imaani tasmi.m samaye aayatanaani honti.
text.530: [03]125^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye dhaatuyo honti?  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu -- imaa tasmi.m samaye dhaatuyo honti.
text.531: [03]126^b^.^eb^ katame tasmi.m samaye aahaaraa honti?  phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro, vi~n~naa.naahaaro -- ime tasmi.m samaye  aahaaraa honti.
text.532: [03]127^b^.^eb^ katamaani tasmi.m samaye indriyaani honti?  saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m,  manindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m -- imaani tasmi.m samaye  indriyaani honti.
text.533: [03]128^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye jhaana.m hoti? vitakko,  vicaaro, piiti, sukha.m, cittassekaggataa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye jhaana.m  hoti.
text.534: [03]129^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye maggo hoti?  sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi  -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye maggo hoti.
text.535: [03]130^b^.^eb^ katamaani ^a^"M0.0037"^ea^tasmi.m samaye balaani  honti? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m,  hiribala.m, ottappabala.m -- imaani tasmi.m samaye balaani honti.
text.536: [03]131^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0035"^ea^tasmi.m samaye hetuu honti? alobho,  adoso, amoho -- ime tasmi.m samaye hetuu honti.
text.537: [03]132^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0042"^ea^tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  aya.m tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti.
text.538: [03]133^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti...pe0...  aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti.
text.539: [03]134^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti...pe0...  aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti.
text.540: [03]135^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti...pe0...  aya.m tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti?
text.541: [03]136^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti...pe0... ida.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti.
text.542: [03]137^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandho  hoti...pe0... aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandho hoti.
text.543: [03]138^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naakkhandho  hoti...pe0... aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naakkhandho hoti.
text.544: [03]139^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho  hoti...pe0... aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti.
text.545: [03]140^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  hoti...pe0... aya.m tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandho hoti.
text.546: [03]141^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0036"^ea^tasmi.m samaye manaayatana.m hoti...pe0...  ida.m tasmi.m samaye manaayatana.m hoti.
text.547: [03]142^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0038"^ea^tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m  hoti...pe0... ida.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.548: [03]143^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0043"^ea^tasmi.m samaye manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  hoti...pe0... aya.m tasmi.m samaye manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti.
text.549: [03]144^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye dhammaayatana.m hoti?  vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  dhammaayatana.m hoti.
text.550: [03]145^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye dhammadhaatu hoti?  vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  dhammadhaatu hoti.
text.551: [03]ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa  aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.554: [03]146^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0037"^ea^dhammaa  kusalaa? yasmi.m ^a^"P0.0027"^ea^samaye kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m  hoti somanassasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m sasa"nkhaarena ruupaaramma.na.m  vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.556: [03]147^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti somanassasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m  ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa gandhaaramma.na.m vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa  pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, piiti hoti, sukha.m hoti,  cittassekaggataa hoti, saddhindriya.m hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti,  satindriya.m ^a^"V0.0044"^ea^hoti, samaadhindriya.m hoti ^a^"M0.0039"^ea^, manindriya.m hoti,  somanassindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti, sammaasa"nkappo hoti,  sammaavaayaamo hoti, sammaasati hoti, sammaasamaadhi hoti, saddhaabala.m  hoti, viiriyabala.m hoti, satibala.m hoti, samaadhibala.m hoti, hiribala.m  hoti, ottappabala.m hoti, alobho hoti, adoso hoti, anabhijjhaa  hoti, abyaapaado hoti, hirii hoti, ottappa.m hoti, kaayapassaddhi  hoti, cittapassaddhi hoti, kaayalahutaa hoti, cittalahutaa hoti,  kaayamudutaa hoti, cittamudutaa hoti, kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti,  cittakamma~n~nataa hoti, kaayapaagu~n~nataa hoti, cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti,  kaayujukataa hoti, cittujukataa hoti, sati hoti, samatho hoti,  paggaaho hoti, avikkhepo hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi  atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  kusalaa...pe0....
text.557: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, sattindriyaani  honti ^a^"T0.0038"^ea^, pa~nca"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti, catura"ngiko maggo hoti, cha balaani  honti, dve hetuu honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... eka.m dhammaayatana.m  hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi  atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  kusalaa...pe0....
text.558: [03]148^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"P0.0028"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti? phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro piiti  cittassekaggataa saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m  jiivitindriya.m sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi  saddhaabala.m viiriyabala.m satibala.m samaadhibala.m hiribala.m ottappabala.m  alobho adoso anabhijjhaa abyaapaado hirii ottappa.m kaayapassaddhi  cittapassaddhi kaayalahutaa cittalahutaa kaayamudutaa cittamudutaa  kaayakamma~n~nataa cittakamma~n~nataa kaayapaagu~n~nataa cittapaagu~n~nataa  kaayujukataa cittujukataa sati samatho paggaaho avikkhepo; ye vaa pana  tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa  vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.560: [03]149^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0040"^ea^^a^"V0.0045"^ea^  dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti  somanassasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m sasa"nkhaarena ruupaaramma.na.m ^a^"T0.0039"^ea^vaa...pe0...  dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.562: [03]150^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m  ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa gandhaaramma.na.m vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa  pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti,  saddhindriya.m hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti, satindriya.m hoti,  samaadhindriya.m hoti, pa~n~nindriya.m hoti, manindriya.m hoti,  upekkhindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti,  sammaasa"nkappo hoti, sammaavaayaamo hoti, sammaasati hoti,  sammaasamaadhi hoti, saddhaabala.m hoti, viiriyabala.m hoti, satibala.m  hoti, samaadhibala.m hoti, pa~n~naabala.m hoti, hiribala.m hoti,  ottappabala.m hoti, alobho hoti, adoso hoti, amoho hoti,  anabhijjhaa hoti, abyaapaado hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti, hirii hoti,  ottappa.m hoti, kaayapassaddhi hoti, cittapassaddhi hoti, kaayalahutaa  hoti, cittalahutaa hoti, kaayamudutaa hoti, cittamudutaa hoti,  kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti, cittakamma~n~nataa hoti kaayapaagu~n~nataa ^a^"T0.0040"^ea^hoti,  cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti, kaayujukataa hoti, cittujukataa hoti, sati  hoti, sampaja~n~na.m hoti, samatho hoti, vipassanaa hoti, paggaaho  hoti, avikkhepo hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.563: [03]151^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti.
text.564: [03]152^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0041"^ea^tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m ^a^"V0.0046"^ea^cetasika.m neva  saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa  adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti...pe0....
text.565: [03]153^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa hoti...pe0....
text.566: [03]154^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti...pe0... ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  kusalaa...pe0....
text.567: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti ^a^"T0.0041"^ea^, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, a.t.thindriyaani  honti, catura"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti, pa~nca"ngiko maggo hoti, satta  balaani honti, tayo hetuu honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... eka.m  dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  kusalaa...pe0....
text.568: [03]155^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"P0.0029"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti? phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro  cittassekaggataa saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m  pa~n~nindriya.m jiivitindriya.m sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaayaamo  sammaasati sammaasamaadhi saddhaabala.m viiriyabala.m satibala.m samaadhibala.m  pa~n~naabala.m hiribala.m ottappabala.m alobho adoso amoho anabhijjhaa  abyaapaado sammaadi.t.thi hirii ottappa.m kaayapassaddhi cittapassaddhi  kaayalahutaa cittalahutaa kaayamudutaa cittamudutaa kaayakamma~n~nataa  cittakamma~n~nataa kaayapaagu~n~nataa cittapaagu~n~nataa kaayujukataa cittujukataa  sati sampaja~n~na.m samatho vipassanaa paggaaho avikkhepo.
text.569: [03]ye ^a^"M0.0042"^ea^vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m ^a^"V0.0047"^ea^.thapetvaa  sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.571: [03]156^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0042"^ea^dhammaa  kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti  upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m sasa"nkhaarena ruupaaramma.na.m vaa...pe0...  dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.573: [03]157^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m  ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa gandhaaramma.na.m vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa  pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti,  saddhindriya.m hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti, satindriya.m hoti,  samaadhindriya.m hoti, manindriya.m hoti, upekkhindriya.m hoti,  jiivitindriya.m hoti, sammaasa"nkappo hoti, sammaavaayaamo hoti,  sammaasati hoti, sammaasamaadhi hoti, saddhaabala.m hoti, viiriyabala.m  hoti, satibala.m hoti, samaadhibala.m hoti, hiribala.m hoti,  ottappabala.m hoti, alobho hoti, adoso hoti, anabhijjhaa hoti,  abyaapaado hoti, hirii hoti, ottappa.m hoti, kaayapassaddhi hoti,  cittapassaddhi hoti, kaayalahutaa hoti, cittalahutaa hoti, kaayamudutaa  hoti, cittamudutaa hoti, kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti, cittakamma~n~nataa  hoti, kaayapaagu~n~nataa hoti ^a^"T0.0043"^ea^, cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti, kaayujukataa hoti,  cittujukataa hoti, sati hoti, samatho hoti, paggaaho hoti,  avikkhepo ^a^"M0.0043"^ea^hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi  atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  kusalaa...pe0....

text.584: [03]160^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"M0.0044"^ea^^a^"P0.0031"^ea^^a^"V0.0049"^ea^dhammaa kusalaa?  yasmi.m samaye ruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti vivicceva kaamehi  vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m  pa.thama.m jhaana.m ^v{pa.thamajjhaana.m (sii0)}v^ upasampajja viharati pathaviikasi.na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
