text.744: [03]270^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  kaamaavacara.m kusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti somanassasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m  sasa"nkhaarena...pe0... ^a^"P0.0057"^ea^somanassasahagata.m  ~naa.navippayutta.m...pe0... somanassasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m  sasa"nkhaarena...pe0... upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m...pe0...  upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.nasampayutta.m sasa"nkhaarena...pe0... upekkhaasahagata.m  ~naa.navippayutta.m...pe0... upekkhaasahagata.m ~naa.navippayutta.m sasa"nkhaarena  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0...  chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m hiina.m...pe0...  majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m hiina.m...pe0...  majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... ^a^"M0.0070"^ea^cittaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... ^a^"T0.0080"^ea^avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.747: [03]271^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  ruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati pathaviikasi.na.m hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0...  pa.niita.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... cittaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.748: [03]272^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0078"^ea^dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  ruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m  jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m...pe0... pa.thama.m  jhaana.m...pe0... pa~ncama.m jhaana.m ^a^"P0.0058"^ea^upasampajja viharati  pathaviikasi.na.m hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0...  chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... cittaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m, tasmi.m ^a^"T0.0081"^ea^samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.751: [03]273^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa  pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m ^a^"M0.0071"^ea^amanasikaaraa  aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0...  pa.niita.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... cittaadhipateyya.m  ^a^"P0.0059"^ea^hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0...  viima.msaadhipateyya.m hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m, tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  kusalaa.
text.752: [03]274^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m ^a^"V0.0079"^ea^  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0...  pa.niita.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... ^a^"T0.0082"^ea^viiriyaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... cittaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.753: [03]275^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma  aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0...  pa.niita.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... cittaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m ^a^"P0.0060"^ea^, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.754: [03]276^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  aruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~naasahagata.m sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0...  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0...  pa.niita.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m...pe0... chandaadhipateyya.m  hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0... ^a^"M0.0072"^ea^ viiriyaadhipateyya.m ^a^"T0.0083"^ea^hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0...  cittaadhipateyya.m hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m...pe0...  viima.msaadhipateyya.m hiina.m...pe0... majjhima.m...pe0... pa.niita.m, tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  kusalaa.
text.758: [03]277^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0080"^ea^dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti,  vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vitakko  hoti, vicaaro hoti, piiti hoti, sukha.m hoti, cittassekaggataa  hoti, saddhindriya.m hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti, satindriya.m hoti,  samaadhindriya.m hoti, pa~n~nindriya.m hoti, manindriya.m hoti,  somanassindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti,  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti, sammaasa"nkappo  hoti, sammaavaacaa hoti, sammaakammanto hoti, sammaaaajiivo hoti,  sammaavaayaamo hoti, sammaasati hoti, sammaasamaadhi hoti, saddhaabala.m  hoti, viiriyabala.m hoti, satibala.m hoti, samaadhibala.m hoti,  pa~n~naabala.m hoti, hiribala.m hoti, ottappabala.m hoti, alobho hoti,  adoso hoti, amoho ^a^"T0.0084"^ea^hoti, anabhijjhaa hoti, abyaapaado hoti,  sammaadi.t.thi hoti, hirii hoti, ottappa.m hoti, kaayapassaddhi hoti,  cittapassaddhi hoti, kaayalahutaa hoti, cittalahutaa hoti, kaayamudutaa  hoti, cittamudutaa hoti, kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti, cittakamma~n~nataa  hoti, kaayapaagu~n~nataa hoti, cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti, kaayujukataa hoti,  cittujukataa hoti, sati hoti, sampaja~n~na.m hoti, samatho hoti,  vipassanaa hoti, paggaaho ^a^"M0.0073"^ea^hoti, avikkhepo hoti; ye  vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa  -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.759: [03]278^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti.
text.760: [03]279^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m ^a^"P0.0061"^ea^cetasika.m saata.m  cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa  saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti.
text.761: [03]280^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0081"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa  sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti.
text.762: [03]281^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa  cetayitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti.
text.763: [03]282^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0085"^ea^tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m  vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m hoti.
text.764: [03]283^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye vitakko hoti.
text.765: [03]284^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye caaro vicaaro anuvicaaro upavicaaro cittassa  anusandhaanataa anupekkhanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti.
text.766: [03]285^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0074"^ea^tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye piiti paamojja.m aamodanaa pamodanaa haaso pahaaso  vitti odagya.m attamanataa cittassa piitisambojjha"ngo -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye piiti hoti.
text.767: [03]286^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye sukha.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m  vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  sukha.m hoti.
text.768: [03]287^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0082"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye ^a^"T0.0086"^ea^cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.769: [03]288^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0062"^ea^tasmi.m samaye saddhindriya.m  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado  saddhaa saddhindriya.m saddhaabala.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye saddhindriya.m hoti.
text.770: [03]289^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyindriya.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyindriya.m hoti.
text.771: [03]290^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye satindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati  satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  satindriya.m hoti.
text.772: [03]291^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa ^a^"M0.0075"^ea^samatho samaadhindriya.m  samaadhibala.m sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo ^a^"T0.0087"^ea^magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m  -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti.
text.773: [03]292^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~nindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto ^a^"V0.0083"^ea^pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~nindriya.m hoti.
text.774: [03]293^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.775: [03]294^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye somanassindriya.m hoti?  ya.m ^a^"P0.0063"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m  cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa  vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye somanassindriya.m hoti.
text.776: [03]295^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti?  yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa iriyanaa  vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m ^a^"T0.0088"^ea^jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  jiivitindriya.m hoti.
text.777: [03]296^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m  hoti? yaa tesa.m dhammaana.m ana~n~naataana.m adi.t.thaana.m appattaana.m  aviditaana.m asacchikataana.m sacchikiriyaaya pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo  pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m  kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa ^a^"M0.0076"^ea^pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m  pa~n~naasattha.m pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto  pa~n~naaratana.m amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m hoti.
text.778: [03]297^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto ^a^"V0.0084"^ea^pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi hoti.
text.779: [03]298^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaasa"nkappo hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye ^a^"T0.0089"^ea^takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye sammaasa"nkappo hoti.
text.780: [03]299^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sammaavaacaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye catuuhi vaciiduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati  verama.nii akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato  sammaavaacaa magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaavaacaa  hoti.
text.781: [03]300^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"P0.0064"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sammaakammanto hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye tiihi kaayaduccaritehi  aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti  velaaanatikkamo setughaato sammaakammanto magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaakammanto hoti.
text.782: [03]301^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaaaajiivo hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye micchaaaajiivaa aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii  akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato  sammaaaajiivo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sammaaaajiivo hoti.
text.783: [03]302^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0077"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sammaavaayaamo hoti? yo tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho  nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti  asithilaparakkamataa anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa  dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo ^a^"T0.0090"^ea^ viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sammaavaayaamo hoti.
text.784: [03]303^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0085"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sammaasati hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati  satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  sammaasati hoti.
text.785: [03]304^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sammaasamaadhi hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye sammaasamaadhi hoti.
text.786: [03]305^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye saddhaabala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado saddhaa saddhindriya.m  saddhaabala.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye saddhaabala.m hoti.
text.787: [03]306^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyabala.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyabala.m hoti.
text.788: [03]307^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0091"^ea^^a^"P0.0065"^ea^tasmi.m samaye satibala.m  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa  dhaara.nataa apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m  sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo ^a^"M0.0078"^ea^magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  ida.m tasmi.m samaye satibala.m hoti.
text.789: [03]308^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhibala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye samaadhibala.m hoti.
text.790: [03]309^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naabala.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo ^a^"V0.0086"^ea^pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naabala.m hoti.
text.791: [03]310^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye hiribala.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye hiriiyati hiriyitabbena hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye hiribala.m hoti.
text.792: [03]311^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"T0.0092"^ea^tasmi.m samaye ottappabala.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye ottappabala.m  hoti.
text.793: [03]312^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye alobho hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye alobho alubbhanaa alubbhitatta.m asaaraago asaarajjanaa  asaarajjitatta.m anabhijjhaa alobho kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  alobho hoti.
text.794: [03]313^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye adoso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye adoso adussanaa adussitatta.m abyaapaado abyaapajjo  adoso kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye adoso hoti.
text.795: [03]314^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0079"^ea^tasmi.m samaye amoho  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo  dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m  nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo ^a^"P0.0066"^ea^ magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye amoho hoti.
text.796: [03]315^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0087"^ea^tasmi.m samaye anabhijjhaa hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye alobho alubbhanaa alubbhitatta.m asaaraago asaarajjanaa  asaarajjitatta.m anabhijjhaa alobho kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  anabhijjhaa hoti.
text.797: [03]316^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"T0.0093"^ea^tasmi.m samaye abyaapaado hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye adoso adussanaa adussitatta.m abyaapaado abyaapajjo  adoso kusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye abyaapaado hoti.
text.798: [03]317^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sammaadi.t.thi hoti.
text.799: [03]318^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye hirii hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye hiriiyati hiriyitabbena hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye hirii hoti.
text.800: [03]319^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye ottappa.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye ottappa.m hoti.
text.801: [03]320^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0080"^ea^tasmi.m samaye kaayapassaddhi  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa  sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa passaddhi pa.tipassaddhi passambhanaa pa.tipassambhanaa  pa.tipassambhitatta.m passaddhisambojjha"ngo ^a^"T0.0094"^ea^-- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayapassaddhi hoti.
text.802: [03]321^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittapassaddhi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa ^a^"V0.0088"^ea^passaddhi pa.tipassaddhi passambhanaa  pa.tipassambhanaa pa.tipassambhitatta.m passaddhisambojjha"ngo -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye cittapassaddhi hoti.
text.803: [03]322^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayalahutaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  lahutaa lahupari.naamataa adandhanataa avitthanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayalahutaa hoti.
text.804: [03]323^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittalahutaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa lahutaa lahupari.naamataa ^a^"P0.0067"^ea^ adandhanataa avitthanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittalahutaa hoti.
text.805: [03]324^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayamudutaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  mudutaa maddavataa akakkha.lataa akathinataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayamudutaa hoti.
text.806: [03]325^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittamudutaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa mudutaa maddavataa akakkha.lataa  akathinataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittamudutaa hoti.
text.807: [03]326^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  kamma~n~nataa kamma~n~natta.m ^a^"T0.0095"^ea^kamma~n~nabhaavo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayakamma~n~nataa hoti.
text.808: [03]327^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittakamma~n~nataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa kamma~n~nataa kamma~n~natta.m  kamma~n~nabhaavo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittakamma~n~nataa hoti.
text.809: [03]328^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0081"^ea^tasmi.m samaye kaayapaagu~n~nataa  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa  sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa pagu.nataa pagu.natta.m pagu.nabhaavo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayapaagu~n~nataa hoti.
text.81: [03](kha) sahetukaa ceva dhammaa na ca hetuu.
text.810: [03]329^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0089"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa pagu.nataa pagu.natta.m pagu.nabhaavo --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittapaagu~n~nataa hoti.
text.811: [03]330^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye kaayujukataa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  ujutaa ujukataa ajimhataa ava"nkataa aku.tilataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  kaayujukataa hoti.
text.812: [03]331^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittujukataa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa ujutaa ujukataa ajimhataa ava"nkataa  aku.tilataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittujukataa hoti.
text.813: [03]332^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sati hoti? yaa tasmi.m  samaye sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa  apilaapanataa asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati  satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m ^a^"T0.0096"^ea^maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sati  hoti.
text.814: [03]333^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0068"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sampaja~n~na.m  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo  dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m  nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye sampaja~n~na.m hoti.
text.815: [03]334^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye samatho hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye samatho hoti.
text.816: [03]335^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0082"^ea^tasmi.m samaye vipassanaa  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo ^a^"V0.0090"^ea^pavicayo  dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m  nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa  vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m ^a^"T0.0097"^ea^ amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vipassanaa hoti.
text.817: [03]336^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye paggaaho hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye paggaaho hoti.
text.818: [03]337^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye avikkhepo hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye avikkhepo hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi  atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.819: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, navindriyaani  honti, pa~nca"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti, a.t.tha"ngiko maggo hoti, satta balaani  honti, tayo hetuu honti, eko phasso hoti, ekaa vedanaa hoti,  ekaa sa~n~naa hoti, ekaa cetanaa hoti, eka.m citta.m hoti, eko  vedanaakkhandho ^a^"T0.0098"^ea^hoti, eko sa~n~naakkhandho hoti, eko  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti, eko vi~n~naa.nakkhandho hoti, eka.m manaayatana.m  hoti, eka.m manindriya.m hoti, ekaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti, eka.m  dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  kusalaa...pe0....
text.820: [03]338^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0083"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti? phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro piiti ^a^"V0.0091"^ea^  cittassekaggataa saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m  pa~n~nindriya.m ^a^"P0.0069"^ea^jiivitindriya.m ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m  sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo  sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi saddhaabala.m viiriyabala.m satibala.m  samaadhibala.m pa~n~naabala.m hiribala.m ottappabala.m alobho adoso amoho  anabhijjhaa abyaapaado sammaadi.t.thi hirii ottappa.m kaayapassaddhi  cittapassaddhi kaayalahutaa cittalahutaa kaayamudutaa cittamudutaa  kaayakamma~n~nataa cittakamma~n~nataa kaayapaagu~n~nataa cittapaagu~n~nataa  kaayujukataa cittujukataa sati sampaja~n~na.m samatho vipassanaa paggaaho  avikkhepo; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa  aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa  vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.821: [03]339^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti ^a^"T0.0099"^ea^niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.822: [03]340^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati sukhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.823: [03]341^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.824: [03]342^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa ^a^"M0.0084"^ea^vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ^a^"V0.0092"^ea^...pe0... dutiya.m  jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m...pe0... pa.thama.m  jhaana.m...pe0... pa~ncama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m  dandhaabhi~n~na.m...pe0... dukkhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m  dandhaabhi~n~na.m...pe0... sukhapa.tipada.m khippaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.827: [03]343^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti ^a^"T0.0100"^ea^niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati su~n~nata.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa kusalaa.

text.852: [03]358^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m chandaadhipateyya.m...pe0...  viiriyaadhipateyya.m...pe0... cittaadhipateyya.m...pe0... viima.msaadhipateyya.m,  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime  dhammaa kusalaa.

text.857: [03]361^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa  kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m  apacayagaami.m kaamaraagabyaapaadaana.m tanubhaavaaya dutiyaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0...  a~n~nindriya.m hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa  kusalaa.
text.859: [03]362^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"T0.0107"^ea^^a^"V0.0098"^ea^dhammaa  kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m  apacayagaami.m kaamaraagabyaapaadaana.m anavasesappahaanaaya tatiyaaya bhuumiyaa  pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m ^a^"P0.0075"^ea^, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... a~n~nindriya.m hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0...  ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.861: [03]363^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa kusalaa? yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m  ruuparaagaaruuparaagamaanauddhaccaavijjaaya anavasesappahaanaaya catutthaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso ^a^"M0.0090"^ea^ hoti...pe0... a~n~nindriya.m hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti...pe0...  ime dhammaa kusalaa...pe0....
text.862: [03]364^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye a~n~nindriya.m hoti? yaa  tesa.m dhammaana.m ~naataana.m di.t.thaana.m pattaana.m viditaana.m sacchikataana.m  sacchikiriyaaya pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo  sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa  sampaja~n~na.m patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m  pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto ^a^"T0.0108"^ea^pa~n~naaratana.m  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m, ida.m tasmi.m samaye a~n~nindriya.m hoti...pe0...  avikkhepo hoti...pe0... ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa kusalaa.
text.866: [03]365^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0099"^ea^dhammaa akusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  akusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti somanassasahagata.m di.t.thigatasampayutta.m  ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa gandhaaramma.na.m vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa  pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, piiti hoti, sukha.m hoti,  cittassekaggataa hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti, samaadhindriya.m hoti,  manindriya.m hoti, somanassindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti,  micchaadi.t.thi hoti, micchaasa"nkappo hoti, micchaavaayaamo hoti,  micchaasamaadhi hoti, viiriyabala.m hoti, samaadhibala.m ^a^"P0.0076"^ea^ hoti, ahirikabala.m hoti, anottappabala.m hoti, lobho hoti, moho  hoti, abhijjhaa hoti, micchaadi.t.thi hoti, ahirika.m hoti  ^a^"M0.0091"^ea^, anottappa.m hoti, samatho hoti, paggaaho hoti,  avikkhepo hoti ^a^"T0.0109"^ea^; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa akusalaa.
text.867: [03]366^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti.
text.868: [03]367^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m  cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa  vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti.
text.869: [03]368^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa  sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti.
text.870: [03]369^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa  cetayitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti.
text.871: [03]370^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m ^a^"V0.0100"^ea^pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m  vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m hoti.
text.872: [03]371^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa micchaasa"nkappo ^a^"T0.0110"^ea^-- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti.
text.873: [03]372^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye caaro vicaaro anuvicaaro upavicaaro cittassa  anusandhaanataa ^a^"P0.0077"^ea^anupekkhanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  vicaaro hoti.
text.874: [03]373^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0092"^ea^tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye piiti paamojja.m aamodanaa pamodanaa haaso pahaaso  vitti odagya.m attamanataa cittassa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti.
text.875: [03]374^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye sukha.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m  vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  sukha.m hoti.
text.876: [03]375^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  micchaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.877: [03]376^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyindriya.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m micchaavaayaamo -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  viiriyindriya.m hoti.
text.878: [03]377^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0101"^ea^tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa ^a^"T0.0111"^ea^.thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  micchaasamaadhi -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye samaadhindriya.m hoti?
text.879: [03]378^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.880: [03]379^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye somanassindriya.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye somanassindriya.m hoti.
text.881: [03]380^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0093"^ea^tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m  hoti? yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa  iriyanaa ^a^"P0.0078"^ea^vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti.
text.882: [03]381^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye micchaadi.t.thi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye di.t.thi di.t.thigata.m di.t.thigahana.m di.t.thikantaaro  di.t.thivisuukaayika.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m gaaho pati.t.thaaho ^v{pa.tiggaaho (sii0 syaa0)}v^   abhiniveso paraamaaso kummaggo micchaapatho micchatta.m titthaayatana.m  vipariyaasaggaaho ^v{vipariyesagaaho (ka0)}v^ -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye micchaadi.t.thi hoti.
text.883: [03]382^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye micchaasa"nkappo hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye ^a^"T0.0112"^ea^takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa micchaasa"nkappo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye micchaasa"nkappo  hoti.
text.884: [03]383^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye micchaavaayaamo hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa ^a^"V0.0102"^ea^  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m micchaavaayaamo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  micchaavaayaamo hoti.
text.885: [03]384^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye micchaasamaadhi hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  micchaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye micchaasamaadhi hoti.
text.886: [03]385^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye viiriyabala.m hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m micchaavaayaamo -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  viiriyabala.m hoti.
text.887: [03]386^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0094"^ea^tasmi.m samaye samaadhibala.m  hoti? yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti  avisaahaaro avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m  samaadhibala.m micchaasamaadhi -- ida.m tasmi.m ^a^"T0.0113"^ea^samaye samaadhibala.m hoti.
text.888: [03]387^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye ahirikabala.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye na hiriiyati hiriyitabbena na hiriiyati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye ahirikabala.m  hoti.
text.889: [03]388^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye anottappabala.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye na ottappati ottappitabbena na ottappati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye anottappabala.m  hoti.
text.890: [03]389^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye lobho hoti? yo  ^a^"P0.0079"^ea^tasmi.m samaye lobho lubbhanaa lubbhitatta.m saaraago  saarajjanaa saarajjitatta.m abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye lobho hoti.
text.891: [03]390^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0103"^ea^tasmi.m samaye moho hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m anabhisamayo ananubodho asambodho  appa.tivedho asa.mgaahanaa apariyogaahanaa asamapekkhanaa apaccavekkhanaa  apaccakkhakamma.m dummejjha.m baalya.m asampaja~n~na.m moho pamoho sammoho  avijjaa avijjogho avijjaayogo avijjaanusayo avijjaapariyu.t.thaana.m  avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye moho hoti.
text.892: [03]391^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye abhijjhaa hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye lobho lubbhanaa lubbhitatta.m saaraago saarajjanaa  saarajjitatta.m abhijjhaa lobho akusalamuula.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  abhijjhaa hoti.
text.893: [03]392^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye micchaadi.t.thi hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye ^a^"T0.0114"^ea^di.t.thi di.t.thigata.m di.t.thigahana.m di.t.thikantaaro  di.t.thivisuukaayika.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m gaaho pati.t.thaaho  abhiniveso paraamaaso kummaggo micchaapatho ^a^"M0.0095"^ea^micchatta.m  titthaayatana.m vipariyaasaggaaho -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye micchaadi.t.thi  hoti.
text.894: [03]393^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye ahirika.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye na hiriiyati hiriyitabbena na hiriiyati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye ahirika.m hoti.
text.895: [03]394^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye anottappa.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye na ottappati ottappitabbena na ottappati paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye anottappa.m hoti.
text.896: [03]395^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye samatho hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  micchaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye samatho hoti.
text.897: [03]396^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye paggaaho hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho ^a^"V0.0104"^ea^nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo dhiti asithilaparakkamataa  anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa dhurasampaggaaho viiriya.m  viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m micchaavaayaamo -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  paggaaho hoti.
text.898: [03]397^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye avikkhepo hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye ^a^"T0.0115"^ea^cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m  micchaasamaadhi -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye avikkhepo hoti; ye vaa pana  tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime  dhammaa akusalaa.
text.899: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, pa~ncindriyaani  honti, pa~nca"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti, catura"ngiko maggo hoti, cattaari  balaani honti, dve hetuu honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... eka.m  dhammaayatana.m ^a^"P0.0080"^ea^hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana  tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime  dhammaa akusalaa...pe0....
text.900: [03]398^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0096"^ea^tasmi.m samaye  sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti? phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro piiti  cittassekaggataa viiriyindriya.m samaadhindriya.m jiivitindriya.m micchaadi.t.thi  micchaasa"nkappo micchaavaayaamo micchaasamaadhi viiriyabala.m samaadhibala.m  ahirikabala.m anottappabala.m lobho moho abhijjhaa micchaadi.t.thi  ahirika.m anottappa.m samatho paggaaho avikkhepo; ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa  vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime ^a^"T0.0116"^ea^dhammaa akusalaa.
text.901: [03]399^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa akusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  akusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti somanassasahagata.m di.t.thigatasampayutta.m  sasa"nkhaarena ruupaaramma.na.m vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa  panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa akusalaa.
text.902: [03]400^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"V0.0105"^ea^dhammaa akusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  akusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti somanassasahagata.m di.t.thigatavippayutta.m  ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa gandhaaramma.na.m vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa  pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, piiti hoti, sukha.m hoti,  cittassekaggataa hoti, viiriyindriya.m hoti, samaadhindriya.m hoti,  manindriya.m hoti, somanassindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti,  micchaasa"nkappo hoti, micchaavaayaamo hoti, micchaasamaadhi hoti,  viiriyabala.m hoti, samaadhibala.m hoti, ahirikabala.m hoti,  anottappabala.m hoti, lobho hoti, moho hoti, abhijjhaa hoti,  ahirika.m hoti, anottappa.m hoti, samatho hoti, paggaaho hoti,  avikkhepo hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa akusalaa...pe0....
text.903: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye ^a^"P0.0081"^ea^cattaaro khandhaa honti,  dvaayatanaani honti ^a^"T0.0117"^ea^, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti,  pa~ncindriyaani honti, pa~nca"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti, tiva"ngiko maggo  hoti, cattaari balaani honti, dve hetuu honti, eko phasso  hoti...pe0... eka.m dhammaayatana.m ^a^"M0.0097"^ea^hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu  hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa  aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa akusalaa...pe0....

text.907: [03]404^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"M0.0098"^ea^tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti?  yo tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti.

text.909: [03]406^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m  adukkhamasukha.m ^a^"T0.0119"^ea^vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa --  aya.m tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa hoti...pe0....
text.910: [03]407^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti...pe0... ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  akusalaa.

text.915: [03]tasmi.m ^a^"V0.0108"^ea^kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti ^a^"T0.0121"^ea^, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, pa~ncindriyaani  honti, catura"ngika.m jhaana.m hoti, tiva"ngiko maggo hoti, cattaari  balaani honti, dve hetuu honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... eka.m  dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  akusalaa...pe0....

text.917: [03]412^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa akusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  akusala.m citta.m uppanna.m hoti upekkhaasahagata.m di.t.thigatavippayutta.m  sasa"nkhaarena ruupaaramma.na.m vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa  panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa akusalaa.
text.918: [03]413^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa akusalaa? yasmi.m samaye  akusala.m citta.m uppanna.m ^a^"T0.0122"^ea^hoti domanassasahagata.m pa.tighasampayutta.m  ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa gandhaaramma.na.m vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa  pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye  phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti,  vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, dukkha.m hoti, cittassekaggataa hoti,  viiriyindriya.m hoti, samaadhindriya.m hoti, manindriya.m hoti,  domanassindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti, micchaasa"nkappo hoti,  micchaavaayaamo hoti, micchaasamaadhi hoti, viiriyabala.m hoti,  samaadhibala.m hoti, ahirikabala.m hoti, anottappabala.m hoti, doso  hoti, moho hoti, byaapaado hoti, ahirika.m hoti, anottappa.m  hoti, samatho hoti, paggaaho hoti, avikkhepo hoti; ye vaa pana  tasmi.m ^a^"P0.0084"^ea^samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino  dhammaa -- ime dhammaa akusalaa.
text.919: [03]414^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0109"^ea^tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti.
text.920: [03]415^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m cetasika.m asaata.m cetasika.m  dukkha.m cetosamphassaja.m asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa asaataa  dukkhaa vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti...pe0....

text.922: [03]417^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye domanassindriya.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m asaata.m cetasika.m dukkha.m cetosamphassaja.m  asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye domanassindriya.m hoti...pe0....

text.959: [03]447^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaakaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa  cetayitatta.m -- aya.m ^a^"T0.0132"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti.
text.960: [03]448^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0090"^ea^tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaakaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti.
text.961: [03]449^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0116"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sukha.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye kaayika.m saata.m kaayika.m sukha.m kaayasamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m  vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  sukha.m hoti.
text.962: [03]450^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.963: [03]451^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaakaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.964: [03]452^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0108"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sukhindriya.m  hoti? ya.m tasmi.m samaye kaayika.m saata.m kaayika.m sukha.m  kaayasamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa saataa sukhaa  vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye sukhindriya.m hoti.
text.965: [03]453^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti?  yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa iriyanaa  vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye ^a^"T0.0133"^ea^vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.966: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, tii.nindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu hoti,  eka.m dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.967: [03]454^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa cittassekaggataa jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa pana tasmi.m  samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa .thapetvaa ^a^"V0.0117"^ea^  vedanaakkhandha.m .thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m  tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.970: [03]455^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^"P0.0091"^ea^dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m  samaye kaamaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaakaa  manodhaatu uppannaa hoti upekkhaasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa vaa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaaramma.naa vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti,  vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m hoti, vitakko  hoti, vicaaro hoti ^a^"M0.0109"^ea^, upekkhaa hoti, cittassekaggataa  hoti, manindriya.m hoti ^a^"T0.0134"^ea^, upekkhindriya.m hoti, jiivitindriya.m hoti;  ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino  dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.971: [03]456^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti.
text.972: [03]457^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaamanodhaatusamphassaja.m cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m  cetosamphassaja.m adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa  vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti.
text.973: [03]458^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanodhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa sa~njaanitatta.m  -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti.
text.974: [03]459^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"V0.0118"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanodhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa cetayitatta.m  -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti.
text.975: [03]460^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m  vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanodhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m  hoti.
text.976: [03]461^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa -- aya.m ^a^"T0.0135"^ea^tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti.
text.977: [03]462^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye caaro vicaaro anuvicaaro upavicaaro cittassa  anusandhaanataa anupekkhanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti.
text.978: [03]463^b^.^eb^ katamaa ^a^"M0.0110"^ea^tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa  hoti? ya.m ^a^"P0.0092"^ea^tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m  cetosamphassaja.m adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa  vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa hoti.
text.979: [03]464^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.980: [03]465^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanodhaatu -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.981: [03]466^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye upekkhindriya.m hoti.
text.982: [03]467^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"V0.0119"^ea^tasmi.m samaye jiivitindriya.m hoti?  yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa iriyanaa  vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m tasmi.m samaye  jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye ^a^"T0.0136"^ea^vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.983: [03]tasmi.m kho pana samaye cattaaro khandhaa honti, dvaayatanaani  honti, dve dhaatuyo honti, tayo aahaaraa honti, tii.nindriyaani  honti, eko phasso hoti...pe0... ekaa manodhaatu hoti, eka.m  dhammaayatana.m hoti, ekaa dhammadhaatu hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye  a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa  abyaakataa...pe0....
text.984: [03]468^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho hoti?  phasso cetanaa vitakko vicaaro cittassekaggataa jiivitindriya.m; ye vaa  pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa  .thapetvaa vedanaakkhandha.m ^a^"M0.0111"^ea^.thapetvaa sa~n~naakkhandha.m .thapetvaa  vi~n~naa.nakkhandha.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa"nkhaarakkhandho  hoti...pe0... ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.987: [03]469^b^.^eb^ katame dhammaa abyaakataa? yasmi.m samaye  kaamaavacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattaa upacitattaa vipaakaa  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu uppannaa hoti somanassasahagataa ruupaaramma.naa  vaa...pe0... dhammaaramma.naa ^a^"P0.0093"^ea^vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti, vedanaa hoti, sa~n~naa hoti, cetanaa hoti, citta.m  hoti, vitakko hoti, vicaaro hoti, piiti hoti, sukha.m hoti,  cittassekaggataa hoti, manindriya.m ^a^"T0.0137"^ea^hoti, somanassindriya.m hoti,  jiivitindriya.m hoti; ye vaa pana tasmi.m samaye a~n~nepi atthi  pa.ticcasamuppannaa aruupino dhammaa -- ime dhammaa abyaakataa.
text.988: [03]470^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^"V0.0120"^ea^tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso phusanaa sa.mphusanaa sa.mphusitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti.
text.989: [03]471^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti? ya.m tasmi.m  samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassaja.m cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m  cetosamphassaja.m saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa  vedanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vedanaa hoti.
text.990: [03]472^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti? yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sa~njaananaa  sa~njaanitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye sa~n~naa hoti.
text.991: [03]473^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti. yaa  tasmi.m samaye tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa  cetayitatta.m -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye cetanaa hoti.
text.992: [03]474^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"M0.0112"^ea^tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti.
text.993: [03]475^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye takko ^a^"T0.0138"^ea^vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vitakko hoti.
text.994: [03]476^b^.^eb^ katamo tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti? yo  tasmi.m samaye caaro vicaaro anuvicaaro upavicaaro cittassa  anusandhaanataa anupekkhanataa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye vicaaro hoti.
text.995: [03]477^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti? yaa tasmi.m  samaye piiti paamojja.m aamodanaa pamodanaa haaso pahaaso vitti  odagya.m attamanataa cittassa -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye piiti hoti.
text.996: [03]478^b^.^eb^ katama.m ^a^"P0.0094"^ea^^a^"V0.0121"^ea^tasmi.m samaye sukha.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m  saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye sukha.m hoti.
text.997: [03]479^b^.^eb^ katamaa tasmi.m samaye cittassekaggataa hoti?  yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa .thiti -- aya.m tasmi.m samaye  cittassekaggataa hoti.
text.998: [03]480^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti? ya.m  tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  tasmi.m samaye manindriya.m hoti.
text.999: [03]481^b^.^eb^ katama.m tasmi.m samaye somanassindriya.m hoti?  ya.m tasmi.m samaye cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m vedayita.m ^a^"T0.0139"^ea^cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m tasmi.m  samaye somanassindriya.m hoti.
